130a4(mdo sde): du thos pa yongs su btsal ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang // chos mnyan pa la brtson par dmi gnas/ chos kyi 'brel pa'i dka' mchid dang don rnam
130a5(mdo sde): bar nges pa'i bka' mchid bgyi ba la rgyun dgum par/ sems te/ yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can ma la gas/ dge ba ci zhes tshol ba la ma brtson pa de dgon pa la
130a6(mdo sde): gnas pa dang / gcig pur dga' bas nyon mongs pa rnams kun tu mi rgyu ste/ de kun nas ldang ba gnod pa tsam gyis dga' ba thob cing bag la nyal yang dag par gzhom pa'i slad du lam
130a7(mdo sde): sgom par mi bgyi de de na bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don gyi slad du brtson par mi 'gyur ba 'di dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dgon pa la gnas pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud
130a8(mdo sde): kyi lcags kyu ste bdun pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos par gyur te/ chos kyi gtam can ni tshig mnyan par 'ongs pa/ tshig gzung bar 'os pa/ 
130b1(mdo sde): snyan par sna tshogs kyi gtam can dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur kyang / de zang zing gi slad du chos ston te/ zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems kyis ma lags/ gang las de'i gos
130b2(mdo sde): dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams mchi bar 'gyur ba de dag la chos ston gyi/ sems can gang dag dad pa dang ldan zhing dang ba mang ba legs par
130b3(mdo sde): bshad pa'i don 'tshal bar nus shing stobs dang ldan pa zang zing gis de rjes su 'dzin par mi bgyid pa de dag la chos mi ston pa dang / gang dag de la bged par bgyid pa ni dman pa
130b4(mdo sde): dman par gyur pa/ gti mug gi rang bzhin can/ chos rgya chen po'i snod du ma gyur pa de dag la chos ston dpa dang / de zang zing gis sbags pa'i rgyud des/ gang dag chos
130b5(mdo sde): bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ snod du ma gyur pa de dag la chos ston pa dang / gang dag bstan par bgyi ba/ de dag la mi ston pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem
130b6(mdo sde): dpa'i chos bstan pa dang rab tu mi ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste brgyad pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten rgyang phan pa yongs su tshol te/ de/ 
130b7(mdo sde): gzhan dag la zab mo'i bka' mchid kyi rgyun bkum nas/ 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i bka' mchid sna tshogs ston te/ 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i bka' mchid ston pas/ 'jig rten
130b8(mdo sde): dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba'i tshig dang / lan gyi tshig la mkhas pas sems can rnams dga' bar 'gyur te/ de la leg so legs so zhes bgyi ba yang stsol bar 'gyur la/ ngas
131a1(mdo sde): kyang byang chub sems dpa' yi rangs par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu gang dag sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba/ chos zab mo la mos pa/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir der 'dus par gyur
131a2(mdo sde): ba de dag sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ yi ma rangs nas gang 'jig rten gyi dga' bas mngon par dga' ba'i sems can de dag la zab mo'i gtam gyi rgyun bcad de/ 'jig rten rgyang phan
131a3(mdo sde): pa'i gtam sna tshogs ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'di ni dam pa'i chos nub par byed pa yin gyi/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don zab mo'i phyir sangs rgyas
131a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung gi/ 'jig rten rgyang pa/ na pa'i gtam sna tshogs kyi phyir ma yin no zhes mchi na dang 'khor de nas mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig smra'o// 
131a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gang 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i bka' mchid sna tshogs bgyid kyi/ zab mo'i bka' mchid 'chab pa de ni/ sangs rgyas
131a6(mdo sde): 'byung ba nub par bgyi ba'i slad du zhugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bka' mchid zab mo 'chab cing 'jig rten rgyang phan pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi
131a7(mdo sde): lcags kyu ste dgu pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar bcos pa/ sdig pa'i grogs po gang dag de la bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams las
131a8(mdo sde): 'dun pa zlog pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa las 'dun pa zlog pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba las 'dun pa zlog pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs las
131b1(mdo sde): 'dun pa zlog pa dang / rab tu dben pa la sbyor ba dang / don nyung zhing bgyid pa nyung ba la sbyor ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid de la rgyun tu mang du ston pa dang / theg
131b2(mdo sde): pa chen po dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid de la mi ston pa dag la bsnyen cing bsten te bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dben par gnas pas theg po chen po las ldang ba de'i
131b3(mdo sde): tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' gdon mi za bar zhal ta byed par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta bgyid pa'i dri ma la sbyor la/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta bgyid pa'i dri ma la sbyor
131b4(mdo sde): ba de'i tshe/ dben pa la sbyor zhing mtshan ma dang bcasapa dang / rgyu ba dang bcas pa'i bzod pa'i sa nye bar ston/ byang chub sems dpa' las yang dag pa/ yang dag phul
131b5(mdo sde): gang lags pa de dag de la mi ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa yang dag phul de dag gang lags she na/ bcom ldan 'das bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems/ 
131b6(mdo sde): dpa'i las yang dag phul lags so// bcu po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i rtsab rab tu gnas te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen cing bsten te/ bsnyen bkur bgyid pa
131b7(mdo sde): dang mgo dang gos la zhugs 'bar ba bzhin du dge ba'i chos ci zhes yongs su tshol ba dang / dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa la gnas te yang dag pa'i brtson pa 'dor ba dang / bag mchis par las
131b8(mdo sde): bgyis pa chud mi gzon pa dang / bdag bde ba la mi chags par rtag par rgyun tu sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa dang
132a1(mdo sde): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs pa'i slad du bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang / gzungs dang spobs
132a2(mdo sde): pa rab tu thob par bgyi ba'i slad du/ ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba dang / so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis sa mi gos par bgyi ba'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
132a3(mdo sde): pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa las shin tu bzla ba'i slad du/ thabs la mkhas pa yongs su tshol ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems
132a4(mdo sde): dpa'i las yang dag pa yang dag phul lags te/ gang // dag la byang chub sems dpas bslab par bgyi ba de ngag de la mi ston pa dang / de la 'di skad du byang chub ni/ 
132a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i yin gyi/ le lo can gyi ma yin no// gal te khyod bskal pa brgyad dam bcus/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
132a6(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma rgyas na/ phyis khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so// zhes mchil/ 
132a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de byang chub sems dpa' gang sgyid lug nas 'bras bu thob par bgyid pa'i gnas mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
132a8(mdo sde): ltar bcos pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bcu pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal gyis khengs shing nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur te/ deng rgyal des
132b1(mdo sde): bla ma rnams dang / sbyin gnas rnams dang / pha ma dang slob dpon dang / mkhan po rnams dang / de las gzhan pa bla ma lta bu'i gang zag rnams la kun tu 'dud pa dang / 'dud pa dang / 
132b2(mdo sde): rab tu 'dud par mi bgyid cing / de la ma gus par gyur pa dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams la mkhas pa khyad par thob pa/ gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum
132b3(mdo sde): tshogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bgyi ba thams cad tshar phyin pa de dag gi gan tu mi mchi/ mi bsnyen mi sten/ bsnyen bkur mi bgyid/ yongs su mi 'di/ yongs su 'dri bar
132b4(mdo sde): mi stsol cing / de ma thos pa'i chos nyan par mi bgyid / thos pa'i chos rnams kyang yongs su dkar bar mi ba gyid/ de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
132b5(mdo sde): pa'i gang zag gang dag bdud kyi lcags kyus zin pa/ chos ngan pa la spyod pa de dag la dga' ba rnyed pa dang / de dag kyang de bzhin du de'i rje su 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / 
132b6(mdo sde): de dman pa la sten cing khyad par dang bral ba 'di lta ste zhan pa'i 'gro ba/ blun pa/ 'on pa/ lkug pa'i 'gro ba/ 'gro ba dman pa nyid du mchi bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
132b7(mdo sde): dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig gis gram pa'i sa phyogs su shing tsam pa ka bskum la/ chab sol bar mi bgyid kyi/ gang nas cha ba mchi bar mthong ba'i phyogs de yang gor ma dang / 
132b8(mdo sde): gyo mog dag gis bkum nas bcom ldan 'das de ltar na zhugs shing tsam pa ka chab dang bral ba yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yal ga phre'u ma chags pa rnams kyang chags par mi
133a1(mdo sde): / 'gyur/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yal ga phre'u chags pa rnams kyang skam ste/ dogs la ltung bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang byung
133a2(mdo sde): chub kyi sems bskyed la/ nga rgyal gyis khengs shing nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur na/ de dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / chos mnyan pa dang bral te/ ma thos pa'i chos rnams kyang mnyan thos
133a3(mdo sde): pa'i chos rnams kyang yongs su dkar bar mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ gang gi tshe rgya mtsho chen po mchi bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ gzhol ba'i phyogs na 'chi bar 'gyuraro// de
133a4(mdo sde): gzhol ba'i slad du/ chu klung thams cad dang / chab mig dang 'bab chu thams cad tshigs chung ngus der 'bab bo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'ang rgyal
133a5(mdo sde): ma mchis pa bla ma dang / sbyin gnas la gus pa yang tsheg/ sa chu dus chos zab mo'i sgo rnams rna ba'i dbang po la grags par 'gyur ro// de dran pa la yang gnas par 'gyur/ 
133a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal gyi khengs/ nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur te/ bla ma dang sbyin gnas la kun tu mi 'dud cing / 'dud par mi bgyid la rab tu ma
133a7(mdo sde): 'dud na/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyus zin par rig par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i nga rgyal dang rab tu ldan pa'i
133a8(mdo sde): bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bcu gcig pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la phyug cing nor che ba dang / longs spyod che zhing nor mang la/ mdzod
133b1(mdo sde): dang bang ba mang po phun sum tshogs par gyur te/ gzugs dang longs spyod dang / rus dang / rigs dang / g.yog 'khor dang bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan par gyur/ ye shes kyi tshogs
133b2(mdo sde): yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson zhing de gzugs dang / longs spyod dang / g.yog 'khor dang / dbang phyug gi stobs kyis rgyags shing bag ma mchis par gyur te/ byang chub sems
133b3(mdo sde): dpa' gang dag rab tu byung bar gtogs pa khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba/ ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa/ gdugs dang gser mas sha dang khrag skam pa/ skyem pa
133b4(mdo sde): nyam chung ba/ lus rtsas yog pa/ mgo dang gos la zhug/ sa 'bar ba bzhin du gdugs mtshan du brtson 'grusabartsams pa/ dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la rtag tu
133b5(mdo sde): brtson pa dang ldan pa de dag la skems zhing nyam chung la/ ma dog ngan cing mi sdug par rig nas/ brnyas par bya'o/ snyam du sems shing de dag nyam chung la/ mdog ngan cing
133b6(mdo sde): mi sdug par rig nas/ brnyas par bya'o snyam du sems shing de dag las legs par bshad pa nyan mi 'tshal gyi/ de de bas shas cher dman zhing ches rmugs par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ bcom
133b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i rgyags pa dang / bag ma mchis pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bcu gnyis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bcu gnyis po de dag ni// byang chub sems
133b8(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag las shin tu ma 'das na/ tha na rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa yang mi 'thob na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
134a1(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lta smos kyang mi 'tshal te/ de ni gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med/ 
134a2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ bdud kyi lcags kyu 'di dag las shin tu 'da' bar bgyi'o// // bam po bcu
134a3(mdo sde): pa ste tha ma'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi
134a4(mdo sde): lcags kyu 'di dag legs par bshad pa legaso legs so// blo gros rgya mtsho de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon de la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag
134a5(mdo sde): gang la gnas na/ bdud kyi lcags kyu thams cad las shi na tu 'da' bar 'gyur ba bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu ga cod pa'i chos kyi sgo khyod la bshad do// blo gros rgya mtsho
134a6(mdo sde): bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo de dag gang zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos sgo yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
134a7(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pas/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam par zhugs kyang bdag nyid skyabs byed pas/ sems can thams cad la cher byams pa 'di ni bdud kyi
134a8(mdo sde): lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo dang po'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin pas/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang yongs su thar par
134b1(mdo sde): byed pas/ sems can thams cad la cher snying rje ba 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo gnyis pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin
134b2(mdo sde): bas smon pa med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bsams bzhin du skye ba 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo gsum
134b3(mdo sde): pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rang bzhin pas/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs kyang / 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can yongs su
134b4(mdo sde): smin par byed pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bzhi pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams dad ni zhe sdang bral ba'i rang bzhin pas/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'i
134b5(mdo sde): rnam par zhugs kyang zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can mo ngas su smin par byed pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo lnga pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos
134b6(mdo sde): thams cad ni gti mug dang bral ba'i rang bzhin pas/ gti mug dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs kyang / gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab
134b7(mdo sde): tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo drug pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i rang bzhin pas/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang kun nas nyon mongs
134b8(mdo sde): pa can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bdun pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pa'i rang bzhin
135a1(mdo sde): bas skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba spangs pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston pa 'di ni/ bdud
135a2(mdo sde): kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo brgyad pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni dang mnyam zhing bye brag med pa'i rang bzhin pas dang mnyam zhing bye brag med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang / 
135a3(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i bsam pa yongs su mi 'dor bar sems can rnams la theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa'i chos ston pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo dgu pa'o// 
135a4(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa la yang mi gnas la / byang chub kyi sems kyang mi brjed/ brtsom pa thams
135a5(mdo sde): cad dang yang bral la/ sems can rab tu thar par bya ba/ 'i rtsom pa yang mi 'dor/ spyod pa thams cad las kyang shin tu 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
135a6(mdo sde): kyang mi ldog pa 'di ni/ blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bcu pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu
135a7(mdo sde): gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rab tu sbyor na/ bdud kyi lcags kyu thams cad las shin tu 'das par 'gyur ro// bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i
135a8(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa ni/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por gyur te/ rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang
135b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i mdzod spu nas 'od rab tu byung bas bdud kyi gnas thams cad mogo mogo por gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog bor gyur to// de nas bdud sdig/ 
135b2(mdo sde): can gyis ltas rgya chen po 'di mthong nas rings shing myur bar la gor du dpung gi tshegs yan lag bzhi pa bsdus te/ bkod pa ci 'dra bas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems
135b3(mdo sde): dpa'i gan du 'gro ba'i bkod pa 'dra bas dpag tshad sum bcu rtsa drug tshun chad bdud kyi sdes bkang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba der dong ba dang / sangs
135b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus der de sgrims par gyur te/ 'ongs kyang de ba bzhin gshegs pa dang / gang dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byad chub sems dpa' rnams dang / 'khor de las sems can
135b5(mdo sde): gang dag 'dul bar gyur pa rnams dang / gang dag srid par kun tu sbyor ba spangs pa'i dag bcom pa
135b6(mdo sde): lta ba phun sum tshogs pa'i gang zag rnams ma gtogs par gang gis kyang de ma mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ blo
135b7(mdo sde): gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis bdud sdig can bkod pa ji lta bu dag 'ong ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho
135b8(mdo sde): bdud sdig can 'di ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad bya ba'i phyir 'ongs nad ni ci zhig bya/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das deng 'di bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu/ 
136a1(mdo sde): 'phang bar bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi byede pa thams cad kyis
136a2(mdo sde): brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni ga la yod/ de na chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ni ci zhes bya/ blo gros rgya mtshos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu shar phyogs log
136a3(mdo sde): su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas gang ga'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de
136a4(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'jom pa zhes/ bya ba chos ston to// ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de
136a5(mdo sde): bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya zhe na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na bde ba'i rgyu dang yon tan gyi rgyu
136a6(mdo sde): dang / bkod pa'i rgyu bskal par brjod kyang zad par mi nus te/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
136a7(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'jom pa des byang chub thob pa de'i tshe/ de byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par lus
136a8(mdo sde): las bdud kun tu skul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung nas/ 'od zer des bskul bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na bdud bye ba phrag brgya 'khod pa/ bdud re re zhing yang g.yog 'khor bye ba
136b1(mdo sde): brgya phrag bcu yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi snying po ga der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad bya bar bsams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad byed
136b2(mdo sde): ma nus te/ de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs so// des kyang ji ltar de dag bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
136b3(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud de dag la chos bstan nas/ bcom ldan 'das da pyis byang chub thob ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de bdud rab tu 'jom pa zhes bya'o// de
136b4(mdo sde): byang chub thob pa'i mchog gi phrugs dang / bzang po'i phru/ gas kyang bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sems dang / 'a rnamaso// rim gro pa yang bdud las btul ba'i byang chub
136b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnam so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gags pa bdud rab tu 'jom pa de ni byang chub sems dang 'i gtam 'ba' shig yang dag par rab tu ston te/ de na theg
136b6(mdo sde): pa gzhan gyi ming yang med de/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni de 'dra ste/ der 'phangs na phyis bdud kyi las byed par mi 'gyur gyi/ bdud
136b7(mdo sde): las btul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas bdud sdig can sngangs
136b8(mdo sde): skrag 'jigs te/ spu zing zhes byed nas 'khor de nas 'gro bar 'dod na/ 'gro ma nus te/ mi snang bar ma gyur na/ de de bas kyang cher sngangs shing skrag ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
137a1(mdo sde): la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'jig rten gyi khams der 'phang bar mi 'gyur bar/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
137a2(mdo sde): la skyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag la bskyab du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig can ma 'jigs shig/ skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag ni/ sems can
137a3(mdo sde): la rnam par 'tshe ba'i phyir gnas pa ma yin no// sdig can khyod byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'di la bzod pa gsol cig dang / 'di nyid khyod la skyob par 'gyur ro// de nas bdud sdig
137a4(mdo sde): can gyis thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gro sa rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smraso// skyes bu dam pa khyod bdag la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ bdag
137a5(mdo sde): bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der mi 'phang bar gsol/ ji ltar gang na skyes bu da ma pa khyod lta bu chos ston par 'gyur ba'i 'khor der bar
137a6(mdo sde): chad bgyi ba'i slad du/ lan 'ga' yang mchi bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o// blo gros rgya mtshos smras pa/ sdig can kho bo lta bu dag la bzod pa gsol mi dgoso// byang chub sems
137a7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams ni/ sems can thams cad la shin tu bzod pa nyid do// sdig can khyod bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der song la/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
137a8(mdo sde): bkod pa de dag dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'jom pa de la ltos shig dang / khyod la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mcho
137b1(mdo sde): lag pa g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ bdud sdig can gyi spyi bor gzhag nas/ bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser sna dang / slob dpon
137b2(mdo sde): chos kyi dpe ma khyud med pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ci 'dra bar bdud sdig can gyi yang de 'dra bar gyur cig ces de lta bu'i bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs
137b3(mdo sde): byas so// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos tshig nga skad smras ma thag tu/ de nas bdud sdig can rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs mchog dang ldan par gyur te/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
137b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par byas denas/ sangs rgyas zhing 'di nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i byin gyi
137b5(mdo sde): rlabs kyis skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas par gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can bcom ldan 'das de
137b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'jom pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan
137b7(mdo sde): bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'jom pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sems
137b8(mdo sde): dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis bdud sdig can de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'jom pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems
138a1(mdo sde): can dbang chung zhing mdog ngan la mi sdug pa 'di lta bu 'di gang nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyog logs sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
138a2(mdo sde): nas/ gang+gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
138a3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhug so// 'tshe'o// gzhes so// de 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher ston to// yang dag par rab tu 'chad do// der phyogs bcu
138a4(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med cing ba grang ba las shin tu 'das pa dag/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyam pa'i phyir 'dus so// byang chub sems
138a5(mdo sde): dpa'i 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba go cha bsam gyis mi khyab pa bgos pa/ bcom ldan 'das de la yongs su 'dri
138a6(mdo sde): zhing yongs su 'drir 'jug pa yang 'dus par gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs de'i tha ma bshad pa'i tshe bdud sdig can mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i las kyi phyir 'ongs pa dang / skyes bu
138a7(mdo sde): dam pa des 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar gzung ste/ bdud sdig can de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'phangaso// de nas bdud las brtul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud sdig can la/ 
138a8(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo cag kyang khyod kyi grogs yin gyis/ sdig can khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bo cag kyang
138b1(mdo sde): bdud du gyur te/ sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa las/ kho bo cag de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
138b2(mdo sde): sems bskyed do// de lta bas na sdig can khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig de nas bdud sdig can gyi lhag pa'i bsam pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
138b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed nas/ tshig 'di skad ces bdag gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// phyin chad bdud kyi las mi bya'o zhes
138b4(mdo sde): smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'du dad sdig can rin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la ba/ dag ste/ de nas 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs kyi
138b5(mdo sde): gtam rgyud ci 'dra ba la rigs kyi bu khyod spobs par gyis shig ces gsol ba btab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gang bdud sdig can seng/ 
138b6(mdo sde): ge'i khri la 'dug pa'i kha'i sgo dang / ba spu'i khung thams cad nas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u rab tu bshad pa lta bu'i gtam byung te/ yi ge de dag
138b7(mdo sde): dang tshig dang / yi ge'i 'bru dag dang mnyam zhing mi nyung mi mang ma lhag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byin gyis rlabs byaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud sdig can de las
138b8(mdo sde): 'dus pa chen po'i le'u gtam thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de dang / btsam
139a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho de dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems
139a2(mdo sde): dpa' de dag blta bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'jom pas mdzod spu nas/ gzugs thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od zer
139a3(mdo sde): phyung ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed de dag las 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// der byang chub sems dpa'
139a4(mdo sde): de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thu dab pa rin po che bkod pa 'khor gyi khyams na bskal dab brgyar yang bsngags pa'i mthar mi phyin pa'i seng ge'i
139a5(mdo sde): khri chen po la bzhugs te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham sa nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher yang
139a6(mdo sde): dag par rab tu bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho yang mthong ngo // 'jig rten gyis khams mi mjed chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bur gnas pa 'di
139a7(mdo sde): yang mthong ngo // de na sgrib pa ci yang med par mthong ngo // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam gyi rin po che'i pad+ma dag la
139a8(mdo sde): 'khod cing chos nyan pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin pa
139b1(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su me tog gtor to// gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyi gtsug gi mtshams su me tog gi gdugs
139b2(mdo sde): chen por gyur to// der thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ me tog gi gdugs de mthong nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang
139b3(mdo sde): me tog gi gdugs 'di lta bur gyur pa'i me tog 'di gang nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag me tog 'di dag ni bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig
139b4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de nas 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis nga la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir gtor to// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bde ba tham
139b5(mdo sde): cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcomaldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'ju/ ma pa de dang / bdud sdig can 'jig rten gyi khams de na
139b6(mdo sde): ci bgyid pa blta bar bgyi'o de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor des gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bde
139b7(mdo sde): ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'jom pa de dang / bdud sdig can de 'khor 'di la ston cig/ de nas bcom
139b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis skabs phye bas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos sor mo bcu las 'od zer stong phrag bcu phyung nas/ 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bcu gnyis
140a1(mdo sde): kyi bye ma snyed po de dag las 'das nas bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// der thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de
140a2(mdo sde): dang / bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'jom pa de dang / bdud sdig can chos kyi khri chen po la 'dug
140a3(mdo sde): ste/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u gtam rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa yang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ rang rang gi pad+ma'i stan las
140a4(mdo sde): langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdu da rab tu 'jom pa de la phyag 'tshal nas/ de dag gis mu tig dang me tog gis gtor to// gtor ma thag tu sangs
140a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smyig/ tsug gi mtshams su me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa/ chen por gnas par kun tu snang ngo // de nas bdud sdig
140a6(mdo sde): can gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'dzem pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu bcom ldan 'das shA
140a7(mdo sde): thub pa'i gan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song shig/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la/ 
140a8(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i byin gyi rlabs dang / rdzu 'phrul
140b1(mdo sde): gyis skad cig thang cig yum tsam de las mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la/ 
140b2(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bdud sdig can la 'di
140b3(mdo sde): skad ces smras so// grogs po khyod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyi brgyan pa de mthong ngam/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams ji tsam du yongs
140b4(mdo sde): su dag pa de mthong ste/ ji ltar dag cing dri ma med pa'i sem sa can mchog byang chub sems dpa' rnams kye gan/ sa de ngo mtshar to// bdag gi de mthong nas kyang bla na med pa
140b5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// smras pa/ grogs po khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ khyod ci yang
140b6(mdo sde): bdud kyi las lha byed dam/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gang gis kyang bdud kyi las byed mi nus// 
140b7(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhag pa'i bsams yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji lta ji ltar bdud kyi las byed pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ches stobs dang
140b8(mdo sde): ldan zhing brtson 'grus rtsom mo// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang gang dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdud kyi las byed pa de nyid/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin la/ 
141a1(mdo sde): brjod kyi/ bdud kyi las ma yin pa de ltar rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu bstan pa dang / bdud kyi cho 'phrul pa stan pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de las srog
141a2(mdo sde): chags nyi khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bdud kyi 'khor de las kyang bdud kyi bu khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
141a3(mdo sde): nas/ mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams bde thams cad kyis brgyan pa der skye bar gyur cig ces tshig de skad smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dag
141a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// // / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang
141a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gso la to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rna/ mas kyi byang chub 'di ni bar chad mang ba/ phyi rgol ba mang ba
141a6(mdo sde): lags na/ gang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis nub par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa de dag la
141a7(mdo sde): yang bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas pa dang / mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang kun tu bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / yongs
141a8(mdo sde): su gzung ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas legs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
141b1(mdo sde): rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros rgya mtsho sems can gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / ston par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ dge ba'i rtsa
141b2(mdo sde): ba bskyed pa de dag 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs zin to// blo gros rgya mtsho de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / tshig gang
141b3(mdo sde): dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi dag bkug nas chos rnam grangs 'di kun tu bsrung ba dang / chos smra ba de dag kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir nan tan byed par 'gyur bar rgyal po chen po bzhi dgug
141b4(mdo sde): pa'i tshig rnams brjod par bya'o// blo gros rgya mtsho dgug pa/ de'i tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa me sa ma san d+hi/ sa ra ne/ sa ra ba ti/ d+ha na/ d+ha na/ ba ti/ d+hu d+hu me/ d+hu d+hu ma ti/ 
141b5(mdo sde): A ba twe/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ra dze/ ka ka re/ kA ru NIhu hu/ hu hu ba ti/ hu hu san d+hi ni rag+hA ta ni/ a bad NAMbI bad Te/ ma d+hu ma ti/ ma ra dzi ta/ bi shud d+ho/ bi shud d+ha pa ti/ 
141b6(mdo sde): mi si le/ ma nor ha re// blo gros rgya mtsho 'di dag ni/ dgug pa'i tshig rnams yin te/ tshig de dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi bkug nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun tu bsrung ba dang / chos
141b7(mdo sde): smra ba de yang yongs su bzung ba'i phyir nan tan byed par 'gyur ro// sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams chos smra ba des legs par kha ton tu byas te/ phyogs bzhir byams pas khyab par byas la/ 
141b8(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po bzhi bsam na/ sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi bkug nas 'ong bar 'gyuraro// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa
142a1(mdo sde): de dag stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyas
142a2(mdo sde): po chen po bzhi po bdag cag lhan cig tu 'thun par gang na yang dag pa dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba der/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang kun tu bsrung
142a3(mdo sde): dang / chos smra ba de yang yongs su gzung ba dang / ci nas gang gis kyang ma sgrib pa'am/ gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o// blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang
142a4(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig brjod par bya ste/ tshig de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug par 'gyur/ da ro// lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug par 'gyur ba'i tshig de dag
142a5(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dza ye/ dza ya ma ti/ ad te/ maHTi/ ma ku re/ sid d+ha ma ti/ shu b+he/ shIn ti ka re/ nad ne/ dAn te/ dAn tA ma ti/ tadakare/ k+Sha yaM/ k+Sha ya mu le/ 
142a6(mdo sde): a pa Ta ni/ ba~M bang Ta ni/ kha ri ba Ta ni kha ri che de smr-i ti/ smr-i ti san d+hi/ A gats+tsha ko'u shi kaM/ ni rdzi tA/ a su ra/ dza yan tI ga/ sa ma ye s+t+waM/ a rab d+ho/ d+harman dzi to/ ra ma \u0f7f/ 
142a7(mdo sde): swastu ya nas/ b+hu tA nA me/ a rak+Sha d+ha rma tsa rin ma// blo gros rgya mtsho 'ad dag ni lnga'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig ste de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug par 'gyur ro/ 
142a8(mdo sde): der chos smra ba des sngags kyi tshig 'di dag legs par kha ton du byas la gtsang ba dang / gtsang sbra'i tshogs khrus lags par byas te/ gos bzang po bgos la shar phyog su me tog
142b1(mdo sde): te sangs rgyas thams cad bsams pa'i dran pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po dang rab tu ldan pas/ seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin bsams la/ koT
142b2(mdo sde): shi ka 'khor legs par yongs su gzhag pa'i phyir tshur shog/ sngags grub pa mngon sum du gyis/ de'i bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag cing yongs su dag la tshul khrims yongs su dag
142b3(mdo sde): pas bsams ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'ongs nas/ 'khor yongs su 'jog par 'gyur/ sngags kyi grub pa yang nye bar sgrub par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor
142b4(mdo sde): de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'dadas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su bzung ba dang / yun ring du
142b5(mdo sde): gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag chos sgra de'i drung du mats+tsha bar bgyi/ de'i 'khor yongs su gzhag par bgyi/ sngags kyi grub pa yang nye bar sgrub par bgyi'o// bcom ldan
142b6(mdo sde): 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / mkhyen
142b7(mdo sde): ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di las bstan pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / 
142b8(mdo sde): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos la gus par bgyis te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
143a1(mdo sde): kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so// zhes bya ba byin te/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/ seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa leg so leg so/ 
143a2(mdo sde): de lta bu ni khyod kyis bya ba'o// lha'i dbang po khyod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsams na/ lha rnams ni rgyal zhing / lha ma yin rnams ni pham par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// blo gros rgya mtsho/ 
143a3(mdo sde): gzhan yang bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams tshar gcad pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams brjod par bya ste/ sngags kyi tshig de dag gis bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams tshar gcod
143a4(mdo sde): par 'gyuraro// sngags kyi tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta daste/ sha me/ sha ma ba ti/ sha mi ta sho tru/ ang ku/ da re/ mang ku re/ mA ra dzi te/ ku ra De yu/ ke yu re/ te dzo ba ti/ 
143a5(mdo sde): o lo ya ni/ bi sha dza nirma la/ ma lA pa na ye/ khu khu re kha ge gra se/ gra sa ne/ o mu khi/ pa rAng mu khI/ A mu khI/ sha ma ta ni/ sarba gra ha ban d+ha na ni/ gri hi tA/ sarba mA ra
143a6(mdo sde): pra bA rdi ni/ bi mug tI mA ra pA shA s+t+rI bi ta bud d+ha mu dA/ a nud ga ti ta sarba mA rai/ pu tsa ri ta/ pa da pa ri shud d+h+yaH/ bi gats+tshan tu sarba mA ra karma Ni// blo gros rgya mtsho tshig 'di dag ni bdud tshar
143a7(mdo sde): gcad pa'i tshig/ nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i tshig ste/ de dag chos smra ba des legs par kha ton tu byas la/ chos kyi khri la 'dug ste/ byang chub kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i
143a8(mdo sde): byams pas/ 'khor thams cad la khyab par byas la/ bdag la sman par 'du shes bskyed de/ chos la sman gyi 'du shes dang / chos nyan pa la nad pa'i 'du shes dang / de bzhin gshegs
143b1(mdo sde): pa la skyes bu dam pa'i 'du shes dang / chos kyi tshul la yun ring du gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed la/ sngags kyi tshig 'di dag mngon du byas te/ chos kyi gtam byed na/ de'i 'khor yug dpag tshad brgya
143b2(mdo sde): tshun tshad du bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i las kyi phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyuraro// gang dag 'ong ba de dag kyang bar chad byed par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
143b3(mdo sde): la bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang bdag byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan par 'phangs pa skyes
143b4(mdo sde): bu dam pa de dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'a phrul 'di dag la mngon sum du gyur to// bcom ldan la dngas bdag deng slan chad bdud kyi sug las thams cad 'dor ro// 
143b5(mdo sde): gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa dang / yang dag par ra ba tu ston par 'gyur ba'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grwa ngardal lam/ gtsug lag khang der chos mnyam pa'i slad du
143b6(mdo sde): bdag nga rgyal ma mchis pa dang / gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas pas mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig can legaso leg so// khyod chos la
143b7(mdo sde): gus pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dis rim gyis bdud kyi las thams cad las shin tu 'das te/ gang skyes bu dam pa de dag gis thob pa'i chos de dag rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// blo gros rgya mtsho
143b8(mdo sde): gzhan yang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgug pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bya te/ dgug pa'i sngags kyi tshig de dag gis tshangs pa bkug nas chos smra ba'i gan du 'ong bar 'gyur
144a1(mdo sde): / sngags kyi tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ me tre ka re/ kAr+yA NA kAka re/ mug ti t+ta kA rI/ u beg k+Sha kA re/ bud d+hA kA re/ d+harmA ka re/ sa g+hA ka re/ su kr-i ta bi dzA ye/ 
144a2(mdo sde): ma hA bi tA na/ ni swa re/ dA g+he o dze ba ti/ o dzo ga me d+harmAn da nis t+ya pri ti shwA ne/ u pa pad ti/ bi shud d+he/ swa tsid to pa sha ma/ bya ba lo ka ya pra mA ne/ byung tiSh+Ta/ sa mi d+hi/ a
144a3(mdo sde): bek+Sha swa d+harma rtsa rA NA na/ ku ru sad d+harma pa ri/ grA ha na/ kr-i ta ma nu pA la ya/ bud d+ha ne/ tI ma ma bya ba tsha/ bsI/ sma ra ta/ d+harma tsakra pra bar+t+ta nAn/ ku ru sa tA bi sho d+ha nAn/ pra ti gri hAn d+harma
144a4(mdo sde): nA ma ga ra mA la ta na/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Ta na ma mA bi ko pa ya/ 8/ blo gros rgya mtsho mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa da gug pa'i tshig 'di dag chos smra ba des legs par kha ton
144a5(mdo sde): du byas la/ tshangs pa'i lam la shin tu gnas te/ zhe' gras pa med pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang / dbang po shi na tu sbas pa dang / shin tu bsrungs pa'i dran pa dang / shin
144a6(mdo sde): tu dkar ba'i phyag rgya dang / shin tu yongs su dag pa'i lus kyi las dang / shin tu bden pas zin pa'i ngag gis las dang / shin tu brtan pa'i blo dang / legs par byas pa'i bzod
144a7(mdo sde): pa'i las dang / shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / legs par brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / shin tu sten pa'i mang du thos pa dang / shin tu yongs
144a8(mdo sde): bsgoms pa'i sems las su rung ba dang / shin tu rno ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po dang / shin tu brtson pa'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi sems kyis legs par zin pa dang / shin
144b1(mdo sde): tu yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad kyi bde ba yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las
144b2(mdo sde): shin tu yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/ seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bsams la/ chos kyi gtam yang dag par rab tu brjod na/ des bsams ma thag tu tshangs pa
144b3(mdo sde): tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// blo gros rgya mtsho de la tshangs pa 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i bltas ni 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor tham
144b4(mdo sde): cad byams pa'i semasu 'gyur ba dang / dbang po nyams pa med pa dang / gcig la gcig mi gnod par gnas pa dang / chos dang chos smra ba la ston pa dang / bla ma ltar phangs
144b5(mdo sde): par sems pa dang / thal mo sbyor ba dang sems rtse gcig pa dang / mi g.yeng bar yid la byed pa dang / rus shing // ra byed pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / sems thams cad kyis
144b6(mdo sde): sems pa dang / rna ba blags te nyan par 'gyur ba'o// chos smra ba de la yang sngon lung ma mnos pa dang / sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams kyang mngon du 'gyur ste/ 'khor der mi mjed kyi bdag
144b7(mdo sde): po tshangs pa 'ongs par rig par bya'o// de nas mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
144b8(mdo sde): 'das bdag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gnas te/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa'i bde ba la gnas pa bor la/ gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa'i 'khor der mchi bar bgyi'o// chos
145a1(mdo sde): smra ba de la yang chos brgyad bsgrub par bgyi'o// brgyad gang zhe na/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos mi bskyud par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la dran pa bsgrub par bgyi/ chos zab mo
145a2(mdo sde): rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du de la blo gros bsgrub par bgyi'o// don gyi rnam pa rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du de la rtogs pa bsgrub par bgyi/ 'khor thams cad zil gyis mi non par bgyi ba'i
145a3(mdo sde): slad du/ de la 'dul bar bsrung ba bsgrub par bgyi/ mi dman par lung bstan par bya ba'i slad du/ de la chos kyi snang ba sgrub par bgyi/ de bgyid cing chos bsgrub pa'i slad du/ de la nges
145a4(mdo sde): par 'byung ba'i sgo bsgrub par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'a/ ngas chos smra ba de la chos brgyad po 'di dag bsgrub par ba gyi'o// chos smra ba de la bsrung zhing sba ba dang / dam pa'i chos
145a5(mdo sde): kyang yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ 'di lta// ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par 'gyur ba
145a6(mdo sde): ltar bdud thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcad par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces
145a7(mdo sde): gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ tha ma'i dus kyi tshe ci nas dge ba'i rtsa bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi sug par mchi ba dang / khong du chud pa
145a8(mdo sde): dang / glegs bam du 'gyur zhing nub par mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis rlabs du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
145b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ mdzod spu nas 'di lta bu'i 'od phyung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos
145b2(mdo sde): khyab par gyur nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / rdo dang / gyo mo dang / gzugs su snang ba gang dag ji snyed
145b3(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugasu snang ngo // rin po che bkod pa'i gzugs su snang ngo // rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams na mchod pa'i las byin gyis brlab pa'i gzugs
145b4(mdo sde): kyi rnam pa gang dag yod pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gsheg/ das pa'i gzugs nyid du gnas par kun tu snang ngo // de ba bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis gsung gcig tu kyi
145b5(mdo sde): ma'o chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAHthub pas byin gyis brlabs so// gang bcom ldan 'angs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
145b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'o// gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab pa de la bdud thams cad kyis bar chad bya bar mi nuso// bcom ldan
145b7(mdo sde): 'das gal te gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bdud dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad bya bar brtun kyang / de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la
145b8(mdo sde): bar chad bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa ni 'gas kyang srid/ rgya mtsho thams cad ni skam yang srid / ri rab thams cad ni rnam par 'thor yang srid/ rlung ni zhags pas bcing du rung
146a1(mdo sde): yang srid/ nyi ma dang zla ba ni sa'i steng du lhung yang srid/ na mkha' ni gzugs kyi rnam par bstan tu rung yang srid/ me ni chur 'gyur yang srid/ chu ni mer 'gyur/ 
146a2(mdo sde): yang srid// 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid/ sems can thams cad kyi sems ni gcig tu byar rung yang srid/ nam mkha' dang sa ni 'byar kyang srid kyi/ de bzhin
146a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ni sus kyang bskyod pa 'am/ g.yo ba'am 'khrugs par byed mi nus so zhes gsungs so de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i spyi
146a4(mdo sde): bor phyag bzhag ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'a di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba nye bar bzung ste/ chos
146a5(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang / rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ de nas bcom
146a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis don gyi dbang gang gzigs na de lta ma lags pa/ rgya mtsho dang rgya mtsho chen po
146a7(mdo sde): ltar gting dpag dka' ba'i dran pa dang / blo rab tu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag mchis bzhin du/ dge slong kun dga' bo nyi tsha ba'i 'tshal ba dang ldan pa la/ chos kyi
146a8(mdo sde): le'u 'di lta bu 'di yongs su gtad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho dge slong kun dga' bo rang gi blo'i stobs bskyed pas/ mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin
146b1(mdo sde): ba ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dzin to// blo gros rgya mtsho sems can gang dag dge slong kun dga' bo las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na/ dga' ba dang / dang
146b2(mdo sde): dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob par 'gyur ba yod de/ de dag 'di snyam du/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byed ci mas rje de ltar nyan thos kyang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di 'dzin cing ston pa ni/ de bzhin
146b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ji tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar to snyam du sems par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor de nas lha dang mi kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ ci byang chub sems
146b4(mdo sde): dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'di dran pa dang rab tu ldan pa yin gyi/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa'i mtshongag tu bstan pa'i tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni de lta ma yin no// 
146b5(mdo sde): snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'khor de'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ 'khor gyi sems can rnams la rnam par bltas te/ bcom
146b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'di rab tu dran pa dang ldan pa lags kyi/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnam
146b7(mdo sde): kyi mchog tu bstan pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ sems can
146b8(mdo sde): ji tsam du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can gyi khams ni rab tu mang go/ sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin no zhes gang de skad du bya ba del ji snyam du sems/ 'od srung sems can gyi khams des
147a1(mdo sde): ngam/ 'od srungs gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bde bar gshegs pa tshad ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'od srung yongs su
147a2(mdo sde): brtag pa nye bar bzung ste/ sems can de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de bzhin du ji ltar dge slong kun dga' bo ltar dran pa dang gzungs kyi stobs dang yang ldan par gyur
147a3(mdo sde): kyang / kun dga' bo lta bu'i sems can de dag gi dran pa dang gzungs kyi stobs de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'drin pa dang / gzungs kyi stobs bskyed pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ 
147a4(mdo sde): ba nas/ dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do// 'od srung byang chub se/ mas dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bco ma ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'dzin te/ de bzhin
147a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa gcig gi chos bstan pas/ de bzhin gshegs/ pa gnyis kyi chos bstan pa la sgrib pa 'am kun nas ldang / ba'i bya ba mi byed do// 'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho/ 
147a6(mdo sde): chen po shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char ba'i rgyun 'bab pa'i chu'i rgyun gcig gis chu'i rgyun gnyis pa la sgrib pa 'am/ kun nas ldang ba'i bya ba mi byed de/ chu'i rgyun thams cad kyang rgya mtsho chen pos blangs
147a7(mdo sde): nas/ de la 'grib pa 'am gang ba yang med do// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos bstan pa kun tu 'dzin kyang / de bzhin
147a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa gcig gis chos bstan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis kyi chos bstan pa la sgrib pa 'am/ kun nas ldang ba'i bya ba mi byed de/ de'i dran pa'i stobs skyed pa la bri ba'am gang / 
147b1(mdo sde): ba yang med do// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags brgyad stong gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag kyang byang chub sems
147b2(mdo sde): dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur cig ces smras so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis lha dang / mi'i me tog gis bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems
147b3(mdo sde): dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la gtor/ mngon par gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma bkod pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
147b4(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos nas mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / rtog pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyis pa de bsod nam/ 
147b5(mdo sde): ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyin byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma bkod pa la tshigasu bcad de/ ka' stsal pa/ stong chen po yi 'jig rten khams 'di ni/ gser
147b6(mdo sde): gyis bkang ste bde gshegs phul ba bas// gang gis chos kyi mdzod 'di thos nas ni// mos pa'i bsod nams 'di ni khyad par 'phags// gang gis 'jig rten khams khri rin chen bkang // de bzhin
147b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams la phul ba bas// gang gis mdo sde 'di la 'jug byas pa// bsod nams de la snga mas bskyed du med// gang gis 'jig rten khams ni stong phrag bcu// rin chen bkang ste sbyin pa
147b8(mdo sde): byin pa bas// gang gis mdo 'di bton nas ston pa yi// bsod nams de yi char ni snga ma min// zhing ni bye ba khrag khrig stong gi rnams// rin chen bkang ste 'jig rten slob dpon skyob// sangs rgyas rnams la
148a1(mdo sde): dbul bar phul ba bas// gang gis tshul 'dir rab tu sbyor ba dang // phyogs bcu rnams su gang+ga'i byed snyed zhing // rin chen bkang ste rgyal ba phul ba bas// ji ltar bstan pa/ 
148a2(mdo sde): bzhin du gang gnas pa'i// bsod nams de la mnyam pa yod ma yin// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dang chos 'dzin dang // chos sgrub pa dang srog chags snying rdzob// chos bzhi 'di dag bsod nams
148a3(mdo sde): mtha' yas te// de dag mtha' ni bde gshegs mi gsung ngo // nam mkha'i khams dang de bzhin sems can khams// sangs rgyas ye shes dang ni byang chub sems// chos bzhi 'di dag dpag tu med
148a4(mdo sde): pa ste/ mkhas pa rnams kyi de thos dogs mi bya// dko/ na mchog chos 'di rab tu bshad pa na// phyogs bcu'i/ zhing ni bye ba g.yos par gyur// snang ba byung zhing me tog char
148a5(mdo sde): kyang bab// sil snyan brgya dag ma dkrol sgra yang 'byung // byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de dag kun// mgu nas tshad du brjod pa tshad du brjod// chos bstan 'di 'dra 'di thos
148a6(mdo sde): bdag cag rnams// 'tsho ba don yod rnyed pa legs par rnyed// gang dag 'di 'dra 'di ni thos gyur pa// sems can de dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed// gang dag byang chub sems ni mi brjed pa// de dag
148a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas shin tu bzung // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba rnams// phyag ni g.yas pa rab tu brkyang mdzad de// yon tan rgya mtsho'i spyi bor bzhag nas ni// shAkya seng ge'i bskul/ 
148a8(mdo sde): ba legs shes gsung // lha dang klu dang lha min mi 'am ci// dri za gnod sbyin mkha' lding lto 'phye che// brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// na mkhar gnas te tshad du brjod pa brjod// shAH/ 
148b1(mdo sde): seng ge 'di dang dge 'dun dang / mdo sde 'di 'dra ba ni 'dzin byed pa// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo ring gnas gyur// legs gsungs chos ni gzhar yang nub ma gyur// gang dag chos kyi tshul ni 'di
148b2(mdo sde): 'dzin pa// de dag la ni bdag cag bsnyen bkur bgyi// bdag cag thams cad gus dang bcas par ni// kun tu srung zhing sba ba spro bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo
148b3(mdo sde): gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa// blo gros rgya mtsho chos kyi tshul chos kyi phyag rgya chos btus pa/ chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa chos rab tu dbye ba 'di ni/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
148b4(mdo sde): byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsha dad pa/ 'chad pa 'chad par 'gyur ba te/ blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis de la gus pa dang bcas pa dang / zhe sa dang bcas pa
148b5(mdo sde): dang sgrub pa snying por bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de/ skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' se/ mas dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang / thams cad dang ldan
148b6(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
148b7(mdo sde): la mngon par bstod do// byin gyi rlabs kyi le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// // 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs las/ 'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya
148b8(mdo sde): ba'i le'u ste lnga pa// rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi ni mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / bud d+ha pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo sde ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skang gsar/ 
149a1(mdo sde): chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ aR+tha sA gar nA ga rA dza ba brod tsha/ nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags bku
149a2(mdo sde): rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
149a3(mdo sde): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'
149a4(mdo sde): mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa/ gzungs dang mdo sde rtogs par khong du chud
149a5(mdo sde): pa/ sems can thams cad spobs pas mgu bar byed pa// mngon par shes pa'i ye shes ston mkhas pa/ pha/ rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ byang
149a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldang ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa la snyan par brjod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
149a7(mdo sde): cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi 'gro ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ bdud thams cad skrag par bya ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi
149a8(mdo sde): dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa'i las yang
149b1(mdo sde): dag par bsgrub pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
149b2(mdo sde): la spro ba'i go cha bgos pa/ bskal pa grangs med par brtson 'grus chen pos yid yongs su mi skyo ba/ seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags pa/ phas kyi rgo ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa
149b3(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi phyag rgyas btab pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa khri nyis stong po la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po dang / 
149b4(mdo sde): ri rab dang / lhun po chen po dang / lhun po chen po rtse 'dzin da dang / lhun po mar me'i rgyal po dang / lhun po brtsegs dang / lhun po'i mtshan dang / lhun po'i rgyal po
149b5(mdo sde): dang lhun po'i rtse mo rdob pa'i rgyal po dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga sgra dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / rin chen tog dang / rin chen rtse mo dang / rin chen dpal dang / rin chen
149b6(mdo sde): 'byung dang / rin chen 'od dang / rin chen khar ba can dang / rin chen rtse mo dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / rin chen dra ba dang / rin chen bkod pa dang / rin chen 'od dang / rin chen gling dang / 
149b7(mdo sde): rin chen sgrol ma dang / lug na rin chen dang / dga' byed dang / chos la dga' ba bkod pa dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa dang / tshig bkod pa'i 'od dang / tshig
149b8(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i 'od dang / gtsug na rin po che dang / lha brtsegs dang / rin chen brtsegs dang / 'od zer stong ldan dang / me lce dang / skar ma la dga' ba dang / zla 'od dang / sems bskyed ma thag
150a1(mdo sde): tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / gser ba rangs rnam dag 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / byams/ 
150a2(mdo sde): pa la sogs pa/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe mengad drug cu dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam
150a3(mdo sde): pa bcu drug dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab 'bras
150a4(mdo sde): la sogs pa thab bral ba'i lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po yo dngas su dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la sogs pa/ 
150a5(mdo sde): 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po dbang byed la so/ gas pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / lha/ 'i bu ded dpon la sogs pa bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu dkar po'i
150a6(mdo sde): phyogs thams cad dang / rab tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa'i lha rnams dang / mi mdzad kyi bdag po la sogs pa tshangs chen gyi ris kyi lha rnams/ lha'i rgyal po 'od gsas
150a7(mdo sde): la sogs pa/ 'od gsal gyi lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po dge rgyas la sogs pa dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po 'bras bu che la sogs pa/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / lha'i
150a8(mdo sde): rgyal po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po dra med 'od la sogs pa/ 'og min gyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan
150b1(mdo sde): la sogs pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po drug khri dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa/ mi 'am ci bzhi khri nyis stong dang / dri za'i rgyal po phreng thogs pa la sogs pa dri za sum khri nyis stong dang / 
150b2(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la stsogs pa klu'i rgyal po bdun khri nyis stong dang / bya'i rgyal po na mkha' lding bzhi stong dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / 
150b3(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am tsau dang / lto 'phye chen po gza brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba stong dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing / 
150b4(mdo sde): mdun gyis bltas te chos ston cing / lha thams cad kyi bko dra pas legs par brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang nas gyen tu 'phags pa bzhin du bzhugs te/ 
150b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyi yongs su bsko/ ra t+ne/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge/ zhing bzhugs so// de nas/ 
150b6(mdo sde): de ltar 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar bzhugs pa'i steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs ri na po che thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan zhing rin po che thams cad kyis
150b7(mdo sde): legs par brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rin po che'i gdugs de thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten 'di kun tu khebs par gyur to// rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang me tog kha dog
150b8(mdo sde): du ma'i rgyan 'phreng 'bum phrag du ma 'di lta ste/ mu tig dkar po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / mu tig dri ma med pa dang / gser lta bu'i mu tig dang / zla ba lta bu'i mu tig/ pad+ma lta bu'i mu tig dang / 
151a1(mdo sde): na mkha' lta bu'i mdog can gyi mu tig rnams 'phyang ngo // mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng de dag las kyang 'od zer dag byung ngo // 'od zer de dag las kyang / me tog kha dog sna tshogs
151a2(mdo sde): pa/ kha dog 'bum phrag du ma/ dri zhim pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba dag gi char mngon par bab po// me tog de dag gis kyang 'khor gyi khyams thams cad pus mo nub pa tsam du gang bar gyur/ 
151a3(mdo sde): to// bar snang la yang 'brug sgra chen po grags par gyur to// a ga ru dang tsan dan gyi phye ma dag dang / tsan dan dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phye ma dag gi char yang bab po// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus
151a4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po stan las langs nas/ bla go/ sa phrag pa gcig tu bzar ta/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
151a5(mdo sde): de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mthong / ma thos pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di dag su'i
151a6(mdo sde): snga ltas lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mu'u dgal gyi bu 'di ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho de bzhin
151a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa la ltar 'ong ba de'i snga ltas yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ ring po ma lon par klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos klu bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi dang / klu'i
151a8(mdo sde): bu mo bye ba phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
151b1(mdo sde): mtshan dang / ba dan thams cad dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs brgya stong dag len cing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
151b2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa la sogs pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa dang / sil snyan
151b3(mdo sde): dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gnyen mdab kyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
151b4(mdo sde): la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'jig rten dag na 'jig rten phan par ba zhed pa 'jig rten gyis mchod 'jig rten mig sbyin pa/ 
151b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten du skyes 'jig rten dri ma rnams kyis ma gos pad+ma chus mi chags pa bzhin// 'jig rten snang ba rnam par ga zugs pa spyan gsum mnga' ba 'jig rten bde ba sbyin
151b6(mdo sde): mdzad pa// 'jig rten nyi ma rkyen la mkhas pa 'jig rten gtso bo khyod la di ring bdag phyag 'tshal// dul zhing dul bas yongs su bskor stobs bcu mnga' ba sbyin pa rnams dang dul ba rnams kyis
151b7(mdo sde): 'phags// 'dren pa nyon mongs rdul dang mun pa dang ni dri ma tha ba sregs shing myu gu bsregs// snying rjes nor gyi gtso bo bdun po sbyin par mdzad cing sems can rnams la byams pas 'phags
151b8(mdo sde): bsod nams zhing ste 'jig rten rtsa lag brtan po khyod la bdag ni mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyi zhal gyi smin mtshams mdzad spu 'bar ba me tog kun nga zla ba dung mdog 'dra// 'di na tshangs
152a1(mdo sde): pa'i gnas na 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyis kyang khyod kyi spyi gtsug mthong mi 'gyur// zla ba lta bu'i zhal nas byung ba'i rmad byung 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang bar mdzad// de yis reg
152a2(mdo sde): par gyur pa'i dbang gis mtshams sems can rnams kyang bde ba nyid du 'gyur// khyod kyi gsung ni shin tu yid 'ong tshig ste zla ba bzhin du yid kyi che bar bgyid// lha dang mi'i sgra skad zil gyis gnon
152a3(mdo sde): cing gcig tu nges par dag la gtsang ba ste// 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa rdul rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid cing shes rab gsal bar bgyid// dga' dang mgu bgyid bde ba shin tu skyed par bgyid
152a4(mdo sde): cing thar pa yang dag ston pa lags// khyod kyi ye shes dus ga/ sum gtogs pa thogs pa ma mchis gar yang chag/ shes pa ma mchis te// khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi spyod pa
152a5(mdo sde): chung dang 'bring dang dam pa ma lus thugs su chud // gang dag gi ni dbang po bsam pa dag dang 'gro dang thar pa tha dad cing 'dra ba// thams cad khyod kyis skad cig tsam gyis thugs su
152a6(mdo sde): chud pas de slad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzogs pa'i byang chub shing rgyal drung du glags lta'i phyir brtson bdud rnams bye ba brgya phrag snyed// khyod kyi thad du lhag par gyur kyang gnas las ma
152a7(mdo sde): g.yos thugs brtser ldan pa'i blo mnga' ba// mnga' bdag khyod kyis bden dang brtul zhugs dpa' dang yon tan rnams dang byams pas pham par mdzad// de slad mi rnams su zhig deng 'dir
152a8(mdo sde): khyod la mchod pa'i slad du khyod la ngoms par 'dzin// mnga' bdag khyod kyis chos rnams byed pa med dang ya ma rla dang zla ba 'dra ba dang // dbu ba glog sprin chu'i chu bur 'dra zhing sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bur
152b1(mdo sde): thugs su chung // gang la rgyu med rtog pa mi 'byung khyod kyi chos de dag ni rtag tu bdag med de/ de ltar 'gro ba'i 'dod pa lnga skyed mdzad pas mnga' bdag khyod ni thar pa lags par 'os// gang gi don tu
152b2(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por dka' ba rnams ni bsten pa dang // gang gi don du rtag tu 'gro la phan mdzad 'dren pa rnams la mchod pa mdzad pa dang // gang gi don tu sbyin dang yang dag sdom dang
152b3(mdo sde): dul dang bzod pa rtag tu sten pa yi// rnam 'dren khyod kyi smon lam chen po shin tu rmad du byung ba de ni rdzogs par gyur// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshog
152b4(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus na zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
152b5(mdo sde): bdag la skabs phye na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang / sa rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'tshal lo// de skad
152b6(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / ngas dri ba
152b7(mdo sde): dris pa de dang de lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba lung bstan pa'i skabs phye nas/ bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad
152b8(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gro dang / ngan song thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang / mi khom pa brgyad las 'das pa dang / lha
153a1(mdo sde): dang mi'i skye bar 'gro ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par/ sangs rgyas mthong ba thob pa dang / dge ba'i
153a2(mdo sde): bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / 'tsham pa'i yul du gnas pa 'thob pa lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dad pa dang dang pa'i shas che ba dang / las kyi
153a3(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa la rton pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs nas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis 'bogs pa lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
153a4(mdo sde): chos don tu gnyer ba dang / chos 'tshal ba dang / chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bas dga' ba dang / thos pa tshol ba das chog ma 'tshal ba dang / thos bsgrub pas mngon par
153a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu 'byung ba la mos pa dang / nags dang nags mdab na rgyu ba dang / 'phags
153a6(mdo sde): pa'i rigs dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / rab tu byung ba'i yon tan rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ 
153a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa dang / chad pa dang rtag par lta ba yongs su spangs pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen kyi chos rnams la zhugs pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa
153a8(mdo sde): thams cad bral ba lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes mthong
153b1(mdo sde): ba lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi spyod pa dang / bsam pa dang / cho ga 'tshal ba lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
153b2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / gzung ba dang / klag pa dang / brda sprod pa la mkhas pa lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud phyir rgol ba
153b3(mdo sde): bcom pa dang / skrag pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyir mi ldog
153b4(mdo sde): pa'i chos la yang dag gzhol ba dang / bzod pa thob dang / lung bstan pa thob pa lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'di
153b5(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po leg so legs/ so// khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di dri bar se// mas pa ni/ klu'i bdag po khyod lags so// klu'i bdag po
153b6(mdo sde): de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / 
153b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gro dang / ngan song thams cad yang dag par chad par
153b8(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs nas/ thams cad srung ba dang / 
154a1(mdo sde): gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng zhing brnyas par mi byed pa dang / bdag gi 'khrul pa la rtog par byed kyi/ gzhan gyi 'khrul pa la mi rtog pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag
154a2(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gro dang / ngan song thams cad yang dag par chad par 'gyur te/ klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi khom pa
154a3(mdo sde): thams cad spong bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog gsum po 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gi bsngags
154a4(mdo sde): pa rgyun tu brjod pa dang / chos 'dod pa rnams g.yengs par mi byed pa dang / gzhan dag gi 'gyod pa mi skyed pa dang / sems can 'gyod cing 'dug pa rnams kyi 'gyod pa sel ba ste/ 
154a5(mdo sde): klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems da rnams mi khom pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
154a6(mdo sde): rnams lha dang mi'i skye bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong zhing / gzhan dag la yang sgrogs pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa mi
154a7(mdo sde): gtong zhing nyams par mi byed pa dang / smon lam la bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de dag la snying rje chen po skyed pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos bzhi
154a8(mdo sde): po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lha dang mi'i skye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral
154b1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags
154b2(mdo sde): pa rgyun tu brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba la sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang de bzhin
154b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa bzhugs pa thos pa der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa dang / rgyud zhum pa med cing rgya chen po la mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos brgyad po de
154b4(mdo sde): ngag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgya sa mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge
154b5(mdo sde): ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di// lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sgyu med pa dang / g.yo med par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos la gces
154b6(mdo sde): pa dang / gus pa dang / ri mo byed pa dang / bka' blo bde zhing gso sla la nges pa dang / nga rgyal med cing sri zhu byed pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
154b7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'tshal ba'i yul du gnas pa thob par 'gyur te/ gsum gang
154b8(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi brlang zhing gya gyur med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna bsal ba dang / gzhan dag gi rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti dang / bde bar sbyar ba la dga' ba ste/ 
155a1(mdo sde): klu'i bdag po chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'tshal ba'i yul du gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos lnga dang ldan na/ byang / 
155a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams dad pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ lnga po dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mos pa'i stobs dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi stobs dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug
155a3(mdo sde): ba'i stobs dang / byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba'i stobs dang / chos nyid la rton pa'i stobs te/ klu'i bdag po chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dad pa dang
155a4(mdo sde): ldan par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos gnyis dang ldan na/ dga' ba'i shas che bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyu'i stobs dang / yang dag par sbyor ba'i
155a5(mdo sde): stobs te/ klu'i bdag po chos de gnyis dang ldan na/ bya// nga chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ba'i shas che bar// 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang
155a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa ra 'gyur te/ gsum po gang dag zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdage med pa la mos pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs dang / yang dag pa'i
155a7(mdo sde): las legs par rtsom pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos gnyis
155a8(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs nas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis 'bogs par 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po gsum
155b1(mdo sde): gyi yongs su bsngo ba dang ldan pa dang / bag yod par gnas pa ste/ de gnyis so// gzhan yang gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa dang / rnam par smin pa la mi re ba ste/ klu'i bdag
