258a4(mdo sde): pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs dpa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi rtsa ba dang rten to// bzlag na mi dge ba
258a5(mdo sde): bcu'i las kyi lam rnams te/ de dag shas cher ba ste/ na cing bsgoms te/ mang du byas na sems can dmyal ba'i rgyu'o// 'bring ni dud 'gro'i skyes gnas kyi
258a6(mdo sde): rgyu'o// chung ngu ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyu'o// klu'i bdag po de la srog gcod pa bsten cing / bsgoms te mang du byos na/ sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i sku
258a7(mdo sde): gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub te/ tshe thung ba dang nad mang bar
258a8(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'o// ma byon par len pas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyi
258b1(mdo sde): mngon par sgrub ste/ longs spyod chung ba dang / thun mongs gi longs spyod du 'gyur ba'o// 'dod pa la log par g.yem pas ni/ sems can dmyal bar khrod do// dung 'gro'i skye gnas
258b2(mdo sde): su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon pa bsgrub ste/ g.yo ga 'khor brtan du mi rung ba dang // 'gran
258b3(mdo sde): zla dang bcas pa'i chung mar 'gyur ba'o// brdzun du smra bas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas gal te/ 
258b4(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/ skur pa mang ba dang / gzhan gyi das bslu bar 'gyur ba'o// phra mas ni sems can dmyal
258b5(mdo sde): bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje 'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par
258b6(mdo sde): sgrub ste/ g.yog 'khor mi 'dum pa dang / g.yog 'khor ngan par 'gyur ba'o// tshig rtsub pos ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// drod 'gro'i skye gnasu khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig
258b7(mdo sde): rten du khrid ngo do// de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/ yid du mi 'ong ba thos pa dang / 'thab mo'i tshig tu 'gyur ba'o// tshig kyal
258b8(mdo sde): bas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dung gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrod do// de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis
259a1(mdo sde): mngon par sgrub ste/ gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig ma yin pa dang / ma nges pa'i spobs par 'gyur ba'o// brnab sems kyis ni sems can dmyal bar khrid
259a2(mdo sde): do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/ cho ga mi
259a3(mdo sde): shes pa dang / 'dod pa che bar 'gyur ba'o// gnod sems kyis ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas
259a4(mdo sde): gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang / rnam par smi/ ngan pa gnyis mngon por sgrub ste/ mi phan pa 'dod pa dang / gzhan gyis gnod par bya bar 'gyur ba'o// log
259a5(mdo sde): par lta bas ni/ sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dung 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid// gshin rje'i 'jig na du khrid do// de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang
259a6(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon por sgrub te/ lta ba ngan par ltung ba dang / g.yo sgyu can du 'gyur ba'o// klu'i bdag po de ltar na mi dge ba bcu po 'di dag gis sdug bsngal gyi/ 
259a7(mdo sde): phung po chen po tshad med pa yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyuraro// klu'i bdag po de la srog gcod pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod tsha bar 'gyur/ 
259a8(mdo sde): long rtsa mi 'phrogs pa dang / tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang gzhan gyis gnod pa bya ba'i 'jigs po las yang dag par 'ongs par 'gyur
259b1(mdo sde): ro/ klu'i bdag po ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang / dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar/ 
259b2(mdo sde): yongs su gtong ba can du 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pas/ bla na med pa'i chos rnyed par 'gyur ro// 
259b3(mdo sde): klu'i bdag po 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang / chung ma mi g.yem par
259b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang dam dang / bu dang chung ma la yang su yang sdang po'i sems kyi lta bor mi 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po brdzun du
259b5(mdo sde): smra ba spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod mi 'phrog sa pa dang / skur pa 'debs pa med par 'gyur ba'i nan tan
259b6(mdo sde): srung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpo'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed do// yid dam la brtan par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po phra ma'i tshig spangs pas byang
259b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang / g.yog mi phyed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / bsam
259b8(mdo sde): pa 'thun pas byang chub sems dpa'i g.yog 'khor 'thob bo// klu'i bdag po tshig rtsub po spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod tsho bar 'gyur/ longs
260a1(mdo sde): spyong mo 'phrogs pa dang / gzung ba'i tshig tu 'gyur/ btsun pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyang spyod pa na yang / 'khor ma mgu bar du
260a2(mdo sde): yang mi 'gro'o// klu'i bdag po tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sa sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang / mnyan par 'os
260a3(mdo sde): pa'i tshig tu 'gyur/ yid ches pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa na yang / the tsom thams cad gcod pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po
260a4(mdo sde): brnab sems spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang / longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pargya/ 
260a5(mdo sde): chen po la de'i sems 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sem sa dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / rgya chen po la/ sa shing dbang che bar grags por 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po/ 
260a6(mdo sde): gnod sems spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang / mdzes pa dang / skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid du 'ong
260a7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / thogs po med pa'i blo dang / thogs pa med pa'i sems dang / dbang po ma mchong ba med par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag
260a8(mdo sde): po log par lta ba spangs pa'i byang chub sems dngos sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang / sangs rgyas la dad cing yang dag par lta ba'i
260b1(mdo sde): khyim du skye'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed
260b2(mdo sde): pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po de ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag sbyin pas brgyan na/ 'byor pa chen por 'gyur ro// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di
260b3(mdo sde): dag nyid tshul khrims kyis brgyan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi don tu smon pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag nyid bzod pas
260b4(mdo sde): brgyan na mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / sangs rgya/ sa kyi dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// // de bzhin du sbyar te/ brtson grus kyis brgyan na bdud
260b5(mdo sde): phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tham sa cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi sa brgyan na/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / 
260b6(mdo sde): ngo tsha shes pa dang / dga' ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyis brgyan na/ lta ba ngan pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms par 'gyur ro// byams pas brgyan
260b7(mdo sde): na sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems su 'gyur ro// snying rjes brgyan na/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar 'gyur ro// dga' bas
260b8(mdo sde): brgyan na/ zhum pa med pa'i sems su 'gyur ro// gtang snyoms kyis brgyan na/ rjes su 'chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong bar 'gyur ro// bsdu ba'i dngos pos brgyan
261a1(mdo sde): na sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pas brgyan na/ lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos
261a2(mdo sde): la mkhas par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong bas brgyan na/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu
261a3(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi rkang pas brgyan na/ lus dang sems yang bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas brgyan na/ dad pa brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang / rmongs pa med pa dang / sems
261a4(mdo sde): las su rung ba la mkhas pa dang / nyon mongs pa tha/ dmas cad spyong pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro// stong das kyis brgyan na/ rdzi ba med cing dbul ba dang / nyes
261a5(mdo sde): pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro// byang chub tu yan lag gis brgyan na/ chos thams cad yang / dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par 'gyur ro// lam/ 
261a6(mdo sde): gyis brgyan na/ yang dag pa'i ye shes 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhi gnas kyis brgyan na/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro// lhag mthong gis brgyan na// 
261a7(mdo sde): chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa'i shes rab dang ye shes su 'gyur ro// thabs kyis brgyan na/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba 'thob
261a8(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po mdor na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag gis stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'thob pa dang / sangs
261b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'thob pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar dag 'thob pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po de bas na dge ba bcu
261b2(mdo sde): las kyi lam 'di dag rgya cher rnam par dbye bas brgyan pa'i phyir brtson par gyis shig/ klu'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa la gnas pa'i grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / 
261b3(mdo sde): ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad dang / rtsa dang shing gal ba dang / sman dang nags tshal thams cad dang / las kyi mtha' thams cad dang / 
261b4(mdo sde): sa bon gyi tshogs thams cad dang / 'byung po'i tshe gas thams cad dang / lo tog thams cad bskyed/ pa dang / rmo brko ba bya ba 'byung ba de dag gi gnas ni sa
261b5(mdo sde): yin no// klu'i bdag po de bzhin du dge ba bcu'i la sa kyi lam rnams kyang lha dang / mir skye ba'i rten to// slob pa dang mi slob pa'i 'bras bu brnyed pa dang / nyan
261b6(mdo sde): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rten yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar
261b7(mdo sde): gyi rten yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang / 
261b8(mdo sde): ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lce dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 
262a1(mdo sde): 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// mdo che ba'i nang nas bkol bar snang ngo // 
262a2(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / mu ne bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sde las sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar gcang
262a3(mdo sde): kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la pha ba pe// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sA ga ra na ga rA dza pa ri pring tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya
262a4(mdo sde): mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams decad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
262a5(mdo sde): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho gnas na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems
262a6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po chos
262a7(mdo sde): kyi mdo bzhi po 'di dag brjod na/ gang dag brjod pas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong brjod par 'gyur ba rnams yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad
262a8(mdo sde): mi rtag par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad sdug bsngal bar
262b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
262b2(mdo sde): po rnams kyis bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhi bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes
262b3(mdo sde): pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / klu'i bdag po chos kyi mdo bzhi po 'di dag brjod na/ gang dag brjod pas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong brjod par 'gyur ba rnams yin no// bcom
262b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong da dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa mngon
262b5(mdo sde): par bstod do// 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhu sa pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang zhu
262b6(mdo sde): chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+ha ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsan drot+ta rA Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags paM
262b7(mdo sde): bu mo zla mchog lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
262b8(mdo sde): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na/ tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na/ dgra bcom pa lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad
263a1(mdo sde): kyang cang shes kyi sems dang ldan bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa yang dag pa'i
263a2(mdo sde): shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad// 
263a3(mdo sde): stong thams cad kyang mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/ gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa/ mngon par
263a4(mdo sde): shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ tshig thogs pa med pa/ chu/ dal 'chos pa med pa/ kha gsag med pa/ shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i sems dang bral ba/ zang zing med par chos ston
263a5(mdo sde): pa/ chos zab mo la bzod pa dam pa'i pha rol tu ston pa/ mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ bdud kyi las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi rang bzhin la the tsom med pa/ bskal
263a6(mdo sde): pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med par smon lam shin tu brtsams pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ khro gnyer med pa/ tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smra ba la mkhas pa/ sems yongs
263a7(mdo sde): su ma gtugs pa/ spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ chos mnyam pa nyid la bzod pa thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen pos 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa/ tshig gcig gis bskal
263a8(mdo sde): pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gcig tu ston pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / mi
263b1(mdo sde): lam dang / mig yor dang brag cha dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / dben pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / gzungs pa med pa dang / na mkha'i ngo bo nyid
263b2(mdo sde): lta bur mos pa/ shes rab dang ye shes tshad med pa la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba
263b3(mdo sde): bzhin du chos ston pa/ sems thog pa med pa/ chos la sred pa dang bral ba nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa/ chos ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa la mkhas pa
263b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i yon tan bko/ dad pa yongs su zin pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa/ 'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par rgyun tu mngon tu gyur pa/ sangs
263b5(mdo sde): rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs pa shas pa la mkhas pa/ kun nas ldang pa dang / lta bdang / nyon mongs pa dang / brag la nyal sna tshogs spong ba
263b6(mdo sde): la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtsi ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
263b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / 'byung dka' dang / spos kyi glang po che dang / brtson pa mi
263b8(mdo sde): gtong dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / spos kyi 'od zer rab tu gtong ba dang / 'brug sgra dang / 'od zer rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / 
264a1(mdo sde): lag na rin po che dang / lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / snang ba'i rgyal po dang / mthong dga' dang / sems can sgrol dang / rtag tu brtson dang / rtag
264a2(mdo sde): tu dgod dga' dbang po dang / ngan song spong dang / rdo rje'i gnas rnam par gnon pa dang / 'jig rten gsum gyi gnas rnam par gnon pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i gnas rnam par gnon pa dang / 
264a3(mdo sde): mthong ba don yod dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / pad+ma'i dpal dang / bal glang spos kyi glang po che dang / spobs pa zab mo dang / spobs pa chen po dang / chos 'phags dang / chos kyi rang
264a4(mdo sde): bzhin the tsom med gyur dang / seng ge'i stabs su 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pa kun sel dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / seng ge chen po mngon par
264a5(mdo sde): sgrogs pa'i sgra dang / brjed med dang / spobs pa brtse gas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dang pa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag las sogs pa byang
264a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang yang thabs gcig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po rnams dang / sna chen po la gtogs pa rnams dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs kyi mi rnam
264a7(mdo sde): dang zha 'bring gnyug ma rnams dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis bkur bstir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ yangs
264a8(mdo sde): pa can gyi grong khyer chen po na tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhug so// de'i tshe yangs can gyi grong khyer chen po na/ l-i tsa byi dri ma med par grags pa
264b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba/ phyug pa nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ longs spyod mang ba/ mdzod dang bang ba mang ba zhig gnas te/ de la chung ma dri med ma zhes bya ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ 
264b2(mdo sde): kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan po zhig yod de/ zla bo dgu 'das pa dang / de las bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa yan lag dang nying lag thams
264b3(mdo sde): cad legs par rdzogs pa zhig btsas so// bu mo de btsas ma thag tu khyim de thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur cing / sa chen po yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ phyi rol
264b4(mdo sde): gyi sgo gang gi wa dag kyang mar khu dang 'bru mar dag rab tu 'dzag cing / zhan pa dang mgon med pa dang / bkres pa dang sdug phongs pa gang yin pa dag ci bder
264b5(mdo sde): yongs su spyod do// yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po na rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / sil snyan da nga pheg brdob pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang ma
264b6(mdo sde): brdungs par sgra 'byin par gyur cing / me tog gi char chen po dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur khyim gyi grwa bzhir yang rin po che sna tshogs kyi rab tu gang ba'i gter chen po bzhi
264b7(mdo sde): byung zhing kha bye ste/ kun tu snang bar gyur to// bu mo de btsas ma thag tu ngu skad mi 'byin cing mchi ma mi glog la/ lhag par yang ser mo bcu thal mo sbyar te/ de'i tshe tshigs su
264b8(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sdog las byas pas 'dir ni gtsang ma yo/ lus su mi skye yid du 'ong bar min// sdig las byas pas 'dir ni longs spyod dag/ 'byor pa'i khyim
265a1(mdo sde): rnams su yang mi skye'o// sbyin du la yang dag sdom dang bag yog cing // gus dang bcas par bla ma bsnyen bkur ba'i// gya nom rang bzhin las kyis rtag tu ni// longs
265a2(mdo sde): spyod bdag nyid chen po'i khyim du 'grub// 'dren pa rgyal ba 'od srung bsod snyoms phyir// yangs pa can gyi grong du zhugs pa na// bdag gis khang bzangs steng nas mthong gyur cing // mthong
265a3(mdo sde): nas der ni bdag yid dang ba dran// de tshe bdag yid rab tu dang gyur na// bdag la me tog med cing byug pa med// phye ma smos med zas dang skom med pas/ ston pa 'di la cis mchod bya snyam
265a4(mdo sde): sems// de nas bdag gis sgra thos sangs rgyas ni// dgro ba dgrol phyir zang zing med spyod cing // 'jig rten brtse phyir thugs rje bskyeng nas ni// sangs rgyas bsod
265a5(mdo sde): snyoms slad du 'jig rten brgyan// gal te rgyal ba de ngag mchod 'dod na// sangs rgyas nyid phyir khyod kyis smon lam thob// byang chub sems bskyed brtan gyur gang
265a6(mdo sde): yin pa/ de las lhag mchod srid pa gsum na med// bar snang sbra thos de nas bdag gis ni// mtshan mchog spras pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // byang chub phyir ni mi g.yo yid
265a7(mdo sde): skyes nas// khang pa de nas rang gi lus mchongs te// bar snang ta la srid la 'dug nas ni// phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin rgyal ba 'od srung de'i sku/ 
265a8(mdo sde): rin chen ri dang lhun po 'dra ba mthong // rgyal ba'i mthus ni bdag gi lag mthil du// man da ra ba'i phur ma che byung zhing // de dag bdag gis 'od srung gtor ba dang // me tog
265b1(mdo sde): gdugs su gyur nas mkha' la gnas// gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa// mtshan gyis sku brgyan de dag bltas na yang // ji ltar 'od srung steng na 'dug pa ltar
265b2(mdo sde): de dag la yang me tog gdugs nyid snang // mkha' la gnas bzhin bdag gis tshig smras pa// bskal pa chu rdul snyed du sbyang bya zhing // byang chub ma thob bdag phyir mi ldog gis// 
265b3(mdo sde): bdag ni sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtsor gyur cig/ bdag gi seng ge'i nga ro de thos nas// de tshe stong phrag bcu gnyis tshang pa yi// lha mi lha min gnod sbyin srin po rnams// sangs
265b4(mdo sde): rgyas byang chub mchog la yang dag zhugs// thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum lhar skyes shing // las bzang bya// sa pa chud zar ma gyur pas// de nas shi 'phos 'dzam
265b5(mdo sde): gling 'dir 'ongs kyis/ de phyir skye bo rnams kyis bas da nams byos// gang tsha sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas gyur pa// de tshe bdag gis rgyal ba shA ka thub mchod// 
265b6(mdo sde): bdag ni 'dod dang longs spyod mo gnyer te// rgyal ba yang dang yang du mchod par bya// bdag gis bsod nams rnam smin de mthong zhing // nyin cig 'dra bar tshe rabs brgya'ang dran/ 
265b7(mdo sde): bdag 'dir skyes pa'i dpal yang 'di 'dra na// mkhas pa su zhig rgyal la gus mi skyed// de nas bu mo des tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas// cang mi zer bar 'dug par
265b8(mdo sde): gyur to// de'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bras bu'i rgyu 'thun pas lus la lha'i gos rin po che dag gyon bzhin du 'byung bar gyur nas// de'i lus las zla ba las shin tu khyad par
266a1(mdo sde): du 'phags pa'i 'od zer gser gyi mdog snang ba dag kyang byung ngo // de nas pha ma dag gis de'i ming zla mchog ces bya bar btags so// de nas bu mo zla mchog
266a2(mdo sde): skad cig dang thang cig dang yud tsam gcig gis 'di lta ste dper na/ bu mo lo brgyad lon pa lta bu'i na tshod du kun tu snang ngo // des sa'i phyogs gang dang gang dag tu 'greng ba dang / 'chag pa dang / 
266a3(mdo sde): 'dug pa dang / mal bcas par gyur pa de dang de dag tu 'od zer gser gyi mdog lta bu dag snang bar gyur to// de'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas tsan dan sa mchog pa'i dri dag dang / kha nas
266a4(mdo sde): kyang ud pa la sngon po'i dri dang byung bar gyur to// de nas ya dngos pa can gyi tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal dbu rnams dang / de las gzhan pa rigs che ba dang / rigs
266a5(mdo sde): mtho ba dag gis/ bu mo zla mchog gi lus kyi gzugs da nga / kha dog yongs su rdzogs pa thos so// thos nas kyang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis sems shin tu dkris par
266a6(mdo sde): gyur cing / so so nas 'di snyam du sems te bdag gi chung mar gyur na ci ma rung snyam mo// de na skye phal po che rnams de thob par bya ba'i phyir sems brtson par gyur te/ de dag las kha cig ni
266a7(mdo sde): li tsa byi dri ma med par grags pa la snyen par byed sten par byed cing / bsnyen bkur byed par gyur to// kha cig ni nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUr+ya dang / spug dang / an
266a8(mdo sde): da rnyil dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru bye ma snyed dag sbyin zhing 'dod pa skyed par byed do// kha cig ni nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / longs spyod dang / kha zas dag ston par byed do// kha
266b1(mdo sde): cig ni bran dang / bran mo dang / las mi dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dag la gsad pa dang / bcing ba dang brdeg pa las sogs pa dag gis 'jigs pa ston par byed do// kha cig ni li tsa byad/ 
266b2(mdo sde): ma med par grags pa la 'di skad ces zer te/ gal te khyod kho bo cag la bu mo zla mchog 'bul bar mi byed na/ de'i phyir khyod la des sdug bsngal 'byung bar bya zhing / khyod la gnod pa
266b3(mdo sde): chen po yang bya'o zhes zer ro// de nas li tsa byi dri ma med par grags pa 'di snyam du/ ma la dpung dag lhags nas/ bdag bzung zhing bcom ste/ bu mo yang phrogs la bdag kyang srog dang
266b4(mdo sde): phral bar mi 'gyur grang snyam nas/ skrag cing sngangs la ba sgyid lug cing / spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ de dran da pa nyams shing bzhin gyi sro shi la/ rab tu ngu zhing mchi ma
266b5(mdo sde): blags te/ mig mi 'dzums par bu mo zla mchog la lta/ 'o// bu mo zla mchog gis rang gi pha ngu zhing yi shi la/ gdong mchi mas yog cing yul yul por gyur pa mthong
266b6(mdo sde): ngo/ mthong nas kyang de la 'di skad ces smras so// yab ci'i slad du 'di ltar bshums shing ba shums mo dag rab tu glog par mdzad lags/ de nas li tsa byi dri ma med par grags pa/ bu
266b7(mdo sde): mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo 'di ltar khyod dbrog cing khyod kyi phyir grong khyer thams cad du thab mo dang rtsod pa dag kun tu byung bar khyod kyis shes sam/ de'i phyir dpung
266b8(mdo sde): dag lhags shing bcom ste/ khyod phrogs par mi 'gyur grang snyam nas de nas mchi ma byung ba yin mod/ de nas bu mo zla mchog gis rang gi pha la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// gal
267a1(mdo sde): te 'dzam gling sems can thams cad dag/ sred med bu 'dra'i brtson 'grus thob gyur cing // de dag mtshon thogs bdag slang rgyug gyur kyang // de dag rnams
267a2(mdo sde): kyis bdag gzhom rngo mi thog/ byams sems ldan la dug dang mtshon mi tshugs// ro langs dang ni 'jigs pa gzhan mi 'byung // byams sems tha ba zhe sdang ma mchis pas/ 
267a3(mdo sde): byams pa'i sems la gzhan gyis gnod mi 'gyur// yab bdag 'jig rten dag la byams pa che// ngan bu bdag bzhin 'gro la dga' bar gnas// nam yang gzhan la sdug
267a4(mdo sde): bsngal ma bgyis pas// de phyir ngan bu sdug bsngal mi 'gyur yab// chags bral nam yang 'dod chags ma mchis shing // byams pa yongs bsgoms zhe sdang mchis
267a5(mdo sde): ma lags// bdag la chags sdang gti mug ma mchis te// de phyir ngan bu gzhan gyis mi thub ya ba// ya ba dang yum la byams pa mchis pa ltar 'gro ba kun la rgyun
267a6(mdo sde): tu bdag de bzhin// yab gang 'jig rten dag la de 'drar byams// da ni nams kyang gzhan gyis gnod mi 'gyur// nam mkhas dog sa 'dzin par bgyid gyur cing // lhun po yungs 'brung
267a7(mdo sde): nang du gnas gyur tam// rgya mtsho chen po gnag rjes zhugs gyur kyang // bdag 'joms bgyid par rngo thog ma mchis yab// de nas bu mo zla mchog gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag
267a8(mdo sde): smras nas/ rang gi pha la 'di skad ces smras so// yab yum de'i slad du/ 'di ltar deng nas dgung bdun na/ bu mo zla mchog phyir byung bar 'gyur zhing / byung nas kyang rang gang 'dod pas
267b1(mdo sde): khyim thab 'dam par 'gyur gyi/ de khyed cag gis bsgrim par bya zhing / lam srang dang bzhi mdo dang sum mdo'i phyogs thams cad kyang rgyan dag gos brgyan par bya zhing / me tog
267b2(mdo sde): dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa'i mchog dag gis kyang byi dor gyis shig ces shul po che dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo thams cad du dril dkrol zhing sgra
267b3(mdo sde): bsgrag tu gsol/ de nas bu mo zla mchog gi pha ma gnyis rang gi khyim nas byung ste/ 'od skad du dang nas zhag bdun na/ bu mo zla mchog phyir 'byung bar 'gyur zhing byung nas kyang / mo na gang
267b4(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i khyim thab 'dam par 'gyur gyis/ der khyed ce ga gis bsgrim par bya zhing / lam srang dang bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo'i phyogs thams cad rgyan dag gis brgyan
267b5(mdo sde): par bya zhing / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me/ tog 'phreng dang / byug pa'i cho ga dag gis kyang byi do/ ra gyis shig ces rang bzhin de dag kun tu bsgrags so// de
267b6(mdo sde): skad so sor thos pa dang / yangs pa can gyi skye bo phal po che rnams 'di ltar rang rang gi lam srang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo'i phyogs dag brgyan par bya ba la brtson par gyur cing
267b7(mdo sde): sems la 'di snyam du cis kyang bu mo zla mchog ni bdag la 'dzin gyi gzhan dag la ni ma yin grang snyam du sems te/ de dag phan tshun 'gran pas rong rang brgyan par byed de/ 'di
267b8(mdo sde): lta ste tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / zhang lon dang / bram ze dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / las me'i bar dag kyang shin tu khrus byas shing lus legs par byugs te// gos bzang
268a1(mdo sde): po bgos shing / rgyan sna tshogs kyis lus brgyan nas/ rang rang gis g.yog 'khor rnams la khyed cag sgrims shig/ gal te bu mo zla mchog 'o bu cag
268a2(mdo sde): gi gan du rang mi 'ong ba lta na/ de'i phyir mthus drongos la phrogs shig ces bskul bar byed do// de ltar zhag bdun 'das pa dang / skye bo phal po che dag ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur
268a3(mdo sde): nas bu mo zla mchog blta ba'i phyir 'dus par gyur to// de nas bu mo zla mchog nyi ma drug pa la zla ba nye ba'i tshe/ gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa yang dag par blangs te mtshan mo mo nyal
268a4(mdo sde): tsam na steng gi khang bzangs kyi thog na 'chag cing 'dug/ go// de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus bu mo zla ma/ chog gi lag pa g.yas par pad+ma sdong bu ni gser/ 'dab
268a5(mdo sde): ma ni dngul/ ze ba ni bai DUr+ya/ snying po mi rdo'i snying po las byas pa 'dab ma 'bum phrag du ma yod pa/ blta na sdug pa 'od gsal ba zhig byung bar gyur to// pad+ma de'i snying
268a6(mdo sde): po'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog gser 'dra la/ gzi brjid 'bar ba/ 'od kyis snang bar mdzad pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan
268a7(mdo sde): pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus gzugs mdzes par byas pa skyi krung gis bzhugs pa zhig kyang byung bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de'i 'od kyis khyim de thams cad snang
268a8(mdo sde): bas gsal bar gyur to// de nas bu mo zla mchog gis pad+ma de mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mthong ba dang / dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba
268b1(mdo sde): dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'di 'dra'i dpal dang ldan pa khyod// ci lags lha'am 'on te klu// lha min gsang ba 'am ma
268b2(mdo sde): 'am ci// su lags dris pa nges par gsungs// khyod sku gser mdog 'od gsal ba'i// tshad ni dmigs su ma mchis te// skad cig mdog gser btsod ka dang // myur bar shel 'od
268b3(mdo sde): 'dra bar gda'// ngan bu slan chad lus kyi ni// 'du shes ma mchis sems mi g.yo// mgon po khyod kyi sku mthong nas// bdag ni dga' ba yangs pa skyes// khyod sku dpal 'bar
268b4(mdo sde): me 'dra zhing // ri las ri bzhin mdzes 'phags pa// ji ltar gzung zhing rab tu gnas// gang nas 'di dar byon gang du gshegs// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
268b5(mdo sde): sku des/ bu mo zla mchog la phyir tshigs su bcad de/ bka' stsal pa// nga ni lha min klu yang min// mi 'am ci min gnod sbyin min// sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge yis/ 
268b6(mdo sde): de ni khyod kyi gan du gtang // nga ni lha min gnod sbyin min// klu min mi 'am ci ma min// chos byung de deng khyod kyi phyir// lha mi 'dul bas bka' stsal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs
268b7(mdo sde): pa'i sku de la bu mo zla mchog gis phyir tshigs su bcad de gsol pa sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba// de mdog ci 'dra 'dir gsungs la// de'i rtags dang dbyibs gsungs
268b8(mdo sde): dang / de thos bdag gis rtogs par 'gyur// khyod 'dir sangs rgyas mtshan gsung na// de'i mdog rtags dang dbyibs mi gsung // sangs rgyas rung spyod gang dang mthu// mi mnyam
269a1(mdo sde): mdzad spobs 'dir gsungs shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku des// bu mo zla mchog la phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// de ni sku mdog gser 'dra
269a2(mdo sde): zhing sa mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga'// sems can kun gyi mchod rten te// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// byed ldan sems can rnams kyi ni// spyod pa mchog dang dman pa
269a3(mdo sde): dag thugs gcig gis ni rtogs mdzad de// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// chos kun rnam pa thams cad du// des ni mi mkhyen cung zad med// ye shes kun gyi pha rol byon// de
269a4(mdo sde): phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// des ni sems can ku na gyi sems// thugs gcig gis ni rtogs gyur kyang // kun gyi sems la nam du yang // rlom pa mi mnga' gzhan
269a5(mdo sde): du na/ sangs rgyas spyod pa sbyin pas 'phags// tshul khri/ mas spyod pas 'thor 'phags shing // bzod dang / brtson pas mngon 'phags la// bsam gtan shes rab
269a6(mdo sde): yang dag 'phags// bzo rnams thams cad legs bslabs pas// des ni mi mkhyen cung zad med// byams dang thugs rje phun sum tshogs// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// gang
269a7(mdo sde): gis bla med 'khor lo yi// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor cing // zhing rnams bye ba rnam rig la// bdag med rab tu bstan mdzad cing // gang gis sangs rgyas zhing stong dang // brgya dang khrag
269a8(mdo sde): khrig snyed rnams dag/ ljags kyis rab tu khyab mdzad pa// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// zhing rnams bye ba stong phrag ni// gang gi'i bye ma snyed dag tu// dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad
269b1(mdo sde): pas na/ de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// 'dren pas phyag ni ya cig gis// zhing rnams bye snyed blangs mdzad cing // bskal pa bye bar de bzhugs pas// de phyir sangs rgyas
269b2(mdo sde): zhes brjod do// zhing rnams stong phrag bye snyed na// ri bo lhun po dza snyed pa// skra nyag gcig gis de sbrams shing // zhing rnams bye bar 'phen mdzad la// chos rnams kun la rang byung
269b3(mdo sde): zhing / gsan nas go 'phang mchog brnyes la// sems can bcings pa rnam 'grel pas// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// dbang ldan gyur cing stobs bcu mnga'// mi bsnyengs
269b4(mdo sde): rtogs par thugs su chud// sangs rgyas chos la nem nur med// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// da dbu'i gtsug tor bltar mi mthong // spyan lnga dag dang ldan pa
269b5(mdo sde): dang stobs dang dbang po lnga mnga' zhing // byang chub yan lag lam la gnas// ngang tshul bzang zhing 'gro gas na bde// zhi zhing dul la bla na med// g.yo med drang po
269b6(mdo sde): gsal ba ste// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// de ni rtag tu mnyam bzhag cing // de la g.yeng ba mi mnga' la// sems can don gyi dus su gsung // de phyir sangs rgyas zhes
269b7(mdo sde): brjod do// yon tan kun dang legs ldan zhing // de ni 'gro ba'i mchod rten te// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// nga yis bskal pa 'am
269b8(mdo sde): yang na ni// bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang // gang phyir sangs rgyas de don brjod// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// de nas bu mo zla mchog dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab
270a1(mdo sde): tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid skyes nas// de bzhin gshegs pa blta bas yongs su bsgom par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la phyir tshig su
270a2(mdo sde): bcad de gsol pa// gang gi yon tan de 'dra ba'i// rdzogs sangs de ltar rngo thog gam// chos 'di thos na mkhas pa ni// su zhig skad 'ga' 'ang khyim la dga'// ji srid bde gshegs
270a3(mdo sde): ma mthong bar// bdag ni rmugs dang gnyid spong zhing // zas dang skom yang mi 'tshal la// stan la'ang mchis par mi bgyid do// bdag gis khyod mthong shin tu rangs gyur cing // yon
270a4(mdo sde): tan bdag nyid thos nas bdag rab dang // mngon sum sang ngas rgyas de ni mthong 'gyur la// slar zhing mtshungadas med dga' bar 'gyur legs grang // bskal pa stong phrag
270a5(mdo sde): bye bar 'jig rten na// skyes bu mchog rnams mthong / ba shin tu dkon// dgra bcom de'i mtshan dengathos bdag gis ni// rnyed par legs rnyed bdag gis rgyal
270a6(mdo sde): ba blta// sprul pa de yis de la 'di skad smras// sems can mchog de tshal chen nang na bzhugs// de yi dge 'dun stong phrag brgyad po dag/ dga' bo sdig med mi gtsang spangs pa
270a7(mdo sde): yin 'di dag re re'ang lag pa ya cig gis// bskal pa mang por stong gsum zhing 'deg tsang // ting 'dzin mngon shes spobs pa rab thob la// thos pas mi 'khrugs rgya mtsho 'dra
270a8(mdo sde): ba yin/ de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis// bye ba dpag med zhing du skad 'gas 'dong // dong nas sangs rgyas bye snyed mngon mchod cing // brtan rnams phyir yang skad 'gas
270b1(mdo sde): ldog par byed// bdag tu 'du shes sangs rgyas 'du shes med// zhing du 'du shes sems can 'du shes med// spros pa sna tshogs kun gyis ma gos shing // sems can tshogs
270b2(mdo sde): chen rnams kyi don kyang byed// dgra thub de dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // de bzhin dge slong dge 'dun lta 'dod cing // thub dbang drung nas chos mchog nyan 'dod na// tshal chen gang na
270b3(mdo sde): ston de bzhugs par song // de nas bu mo zla mchog pad+ma de nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ji ltar bzhugs pa de nyid thogs bzhin du/ khang bzangs kyi steng de nas babs nas/ 
270b4(mdo sde): rang gi pha ma ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rang gi pha/ dam la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ yab gzig/ das ngan bu'i sug pa lag pa na// pad+ma gsar sdong mdzes pa yid
270b5(mdo sde): du mchi/ skyes bu dam pa'i sku la gzigs shig yum// ma thong na su zhig de la skyabs mi mchi// rang gi ga nas kun gser mdog 'dra ba yi// 'od kyis gsal bar
270b6(mdo sde): bdag gis mthong lags yum// skad cig la yang du mar mdog 'gyur bas// sku yi tshad ni gzung bar rngo mi thog/ de slangad rgyal ba'i spyan sngar tshal chen du// rgyal ba go'u tam
270b7(mdo sde): gzigs su gshegs so yum// me tog rnams dang spos mchog bsnams ni su// de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mchod par bgyi// zla ba mchog gi pha dang ma dag gis// yid
270b8(mdo sde): du 'ong ba'i tshig thos legs so zhes// gos rnams dang ni bdug spos spos dag dang // me tog rnams dang phreng ba byug pa'ang blangs// rnga chen rdza rnga ha ba shang gdugs rnams dang / 
271a1(mdo sde): // ngu dang rgyal mtshan gling bu pi bang dang // rin chen sol snyan yid 'ong thogs nas ni// de dag khang ba de nas nges par 'byung // de'i chen nyi ma bdun pa de la srog chags 'bum
271a2(mdo sde): phrag du ma dag/ bu mo zla mchog blta ba'i phyir 'dus par gyur nas// de dag las kha cig ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis sems kun nas dkris par gyur/ kha cig ni lta 'dod par gyur/ 
271a3(mdo sde): kha cig ni rtog pa skyes par gyur nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po rgyan gyis brgyan to// khye'u dang bu mo dag stegs bu dang sgo khang rta babs dang / skar
271a4(mdo sde): khung dang / pu shu dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khangs bza dngas kyi steng dag tu dong ste 'khod par gyur to// de nas bu mo zla mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+ma la
271a5(mdo sde): bzhugs pa de nyid kyang thogs bzhin du pha ma dang 'khor ma nga po rnams dang lhan cig tu me tog dang / bdug spro sa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye
271a6(mdo sde): ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag thogs te/ sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa sna tshogs byed pa de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ rang gi gnas
271a7(mdo sde): nas byung ngo // de nas srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag gis de grong bar gyi dbus su byung ba mthong ba dang / bdag gis 'di gzung bar bya'o// bdag gis 'di/ 
271a8(mdo sde): gzung bar bya'o snyam du sems shing rab tu rgyug go// de'i tshe na yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po na skye bo phal po che de dag lhan cig tu rgyug pa'i tshe/ ha ha chur shog/ tshur shog ces bya
271b1(mdo sde): ba'i sgra chen po byung bar gyur to// de nas bu mo zla mchog gis de'i mod la skye bo phal po che rgyug pa de dag mthong nas/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+ma la bzhugs pa de nyid kyang
271b2(mdo sde): thogs bzhin du bar snang gi na mkha' la shing ta la'i srid du mngon par 'phags te 'dug par gyur to// 'dug nas kyang skye bo phal po che de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras
271b3(mdo sde): pa/ bzod ldan bdag gi mdzes pa'i lus 'di ni/ chags pa'i sems las byung ba ma yin te/ kha dog gser mdog me lho 'bar 'dra ba// shin tu yid 'ong kho mo'i lus 'di
271b4(mdo sde): ltos/ gang dag yul rnams la ni brkam med nas// me ma de dag 'obs 'dra rab 'bar 'dod spong zhing // dab dang po drug rnams sdom pas bsdams pa dang // gang dag tshangs
271b5(mdo sde): spyod rnam spyod dag pa dang / gang dag gzhan gyi bud med rnam sa mthong na/ ma sring snyam du 'du shes skyed byed na// de dag mdzes shing shin tu blta sdug la// rtag tu mchog
271b6(mdo sde): tu yid du 'ong bar 'gyur// gang gis sa 'di kun tu khyab byed pa// bdag gi spu'i khung nas byung ba'i dri// 'dod chags sems kyis bdag gis de ma bsgrubs// de ni sbyin dang dul ba'i
271b7(mdo sde): 'bras bu yin// kho mo 'dod chags ldan pa'i sems mi skyed// 'dod chags bral la chags pa ma skyed cig/ ji ltar smras bden nams yang brdzun min te// mdun gyi thub dbang 'di
271b8(mdo sde): ni bdag gi dbang // sngan chad khyed cag kho mo'i phar gyur la// kho mo'ang khyed kyi ma dang phu nu dang // sring mo 'am phar yang yang dang yang gyur pas// su zhig ma la 'dod chags
272a1(mdo sde): sems skyed byed// sngan chad kho mos khyed cag bsad gyur cing // khyed kyis kho mo'ang sngan chad bsad gyur pas// thams cad phan tshun dgra bo gshed yin na// 
272a2(mdo sde): khyed cag ji ltar 'dod chags sems skyed byed// chags pas gzugs dang ldan par mi 'gyur zhing // chags sems can dag bde 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// chags pa'i sems
272a3(mdo sde): ldan mya ngan mi 'da' bas// de phyir 'dod chags yongs su spang bar bya// 'dod pa'i gzhi las dmyal bar 'gro 'gyur zhing // 'dod chags las ni yi dgas dud 'gror 'gyur// 
272a4(mdo sde): gang dag 'dod chags dkris pa'i sems ldan pa// grul bum lha min gnod sbyin sha zar 'gyur// 'ad dad chags las ni zhar ba thang po dang // lha med gzugs mi
272a5(mdo sde): sdug pa dag tu 'gyur// gang dag 'dod chags ngan pa 'o spyad spyod pa// rnam pa sna tshogs skyon gyi snod du gyur// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob pa dang // sum
272a6(mdo sde): cu gsum pa'i dbang phyug brgya byin dang // tshangs pa dbang ldan dbang sbyor gang yin pa// de'i tshangs spyod yangs pa spyad pa yin// rtag tu 'dod pa dag le brkam pa rnams// dmus long 'on
272a7(mdo sde): ba glen pa khyi phag dang // rnga mo bong bu spre'u dang glang po dang // stag dang gnag rta phye bla ba sbrang bur 'gyur// gang dag tshangs spyod yangs pa spyong byed pa// sa yi dbang phyug dga' ba rnams
272a8(mdo sde): dang ni/ tshong dpon khyim bdag blon por gyur nas ni// bde zhing yod bden par 'gro bar 'gyur// rang rgyal rnams dang de bzhin dgra btsam dang // sangs rgyas mtshan gyis spras pa/ 
272b1(mdo sde): gsal gyur zhing // bla med byang chub zhi pa rtogs gyur nas// sems can tshogs chen rnams kyi don mdzad 'gyur// 'dod pas 'khol ba dag ni bsreg pa dang // yang na du bas
272b2(mdo sde): bdug cing bsad pa'am// bcing dang de bzhin brdeg bsdigs mgo dang ni// rna mig sna dang rkang pa bcad par 'gyur// 'dod spyod nyes pa gcig tu ma zad de// 'dod rnams mi 'thun
272b3(mdo sde): nyes pa mtha' yang med// gal te myur du de las thar 'did na// chur shig rgyal ba de yi spyan sngar 'deng // lha yis mchod pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par// rten dang dpung
272b4(mdo sde): dag yod min zhing // rgyal ba 'byung ba bskal pa brgyar// dkon gyis// thams cad lhan cig 'grogs te 'do// nga bar bya// bu mo zla mchog gis tshigasu bcad pa de dag
272b5(mdo sde): smras ma thag tu nas de'i mdo las chen po rab tu ga yos par gyur cing na mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha 'i bu rnams kyis kyang a la la zhes ca co dang / gzhi'i sgra
272b6(mdo sde): chen po 'bum phrag du ma dag rab tu byung ste/ me tog gi char dag kyang rab tu phab/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang rab tu bsil to// skye bo phal po che de dag kyang
272b7(mdo sde): shin tu yid byung zhing spu zing zhes byed la ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur nas/ 'ga' yang phyin chad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / khro ba dang tho ba dang / 'chab pa dang gnod
272b8(mdo sde): sems dang / rnam par gnod pa med cing thams cad kyang sems kyi sgrib pa dang bral la/ lus rab tu sim zhing nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur nas/ bu mo zla mchog
273a1(mdo sde): de la ma dang sring mo dang / ston pa lta bur sdug par gyur cing phyag byas te/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / gdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug
273a2(mdo sde): pa de dag gis kyang mngon par gtor ro// gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus de nas de'i mod la me tog de dag me tog gi gdugs dpag tshad pyad tsam pa zhig tu gyur te/ de
273a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de'i dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng na 'dug par gyur to// de nas bu mo zla mchog par snang las babs te/ sor bzhi tsam gyis sa la ma reg par na mkha'
273a4(mdo sde): la 'chags bzhin du yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po de nas byung ngo // de'i rkang pa bzhag pa dang / bteg pa thams cad dus chen po rab tu g.yos pa dang / yangs pa
273a5(mdo sde): can gyi grong khyer chen po'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi ste/ nga tham pa yang bu mo zla mchog song po'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
273a6(mdo sde): dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas bsod snyoms kyi phyir/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen
273a7(mdo sde): por zhugs pa dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis bu mo zla mchog skye bo phal po ches yongs su bskor cing rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ra
273a8(mdo sde): ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bu ma zla mchog 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro na/ bdag cag gis
273b1(mdo sde): 'di ci bzod pa thob pa zhig gam/ 'on te ma yin zhes shes par byas/ dri ba 'ga' zhig yongs su dri bar bya'am zhes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dge slong de dag dang lhan
273b2(mdo sde): cig tu bu mo zla mchog ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod gar 'gro/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'dadi skad du du
273b3(mdo sde): mo khyod gar 'gro zhes gsung ba ni gnas brtan gang du bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kyang mchi legs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni yangs pa can du 'jug la/ khyod
273b4(mdo sde): ni yangs pa can nas 'byung na/ 'o na khyod 'di skad du ga nas brtan gang du bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kya dang mchi lags so zhes zer bal ji ltar rigs par
273b5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bringazhabs gang nas 'dege cing gang du 'jog paramadzad lags/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo kha
273b6(mdo sde): ni rkang pa na mkha' las 'dag cing / na mkha'i nyid la 'jog par byed do// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bdag kyang sug pa na mkha' las 'dag cing / na mkha'
273b7(mdo sde): nyid la 'jog par bgyid de/ na mkha'i khams la ni tha dad pa cung zad kyang ma mchis pas/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de'i slad du bdag gis 'di skad ces khyod gang du bzhud pa de nyid
273b8(mdo sde): du bdag kyang mchi lag so zhes smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa to'i bu khyod gar gshegs/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro'o// bu mas smras
274a1(mdo sde): pa btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba lags pas/ bdag kyang der mchi ba lags sam/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ 
274a2(mdo sde): bu mo gal te chos thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba yin na/ 'o na khyod ci'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gro/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra
274a3(mdo sde): dwa ti'i bu yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing / yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba la ni skye ba dang / 'jig pa yang ma mchis la/ 
274a4(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba la ma gto/ dgas par gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das dpar 'gyur ba 'ga' yong ma mchis lag so// de ci'i slad
274a5(mdo sde): du zhe na/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa lags pa'i sla da du'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
274a6(mdo sde): bus bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo 'o na ci khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nem 'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par
274a7(mdo sde): zhugs pa yin nam/ 'on te theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad du/ khyod theg pa gang la yang dag par zhugs pa yin
274a8(mdo sde): zhes gsung ba ni/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du de khyod nyid la zhus/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan gdab tu gsol/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis rtogs pa'i
274b1(mdo sde): chos gang lags pa'i chos de/ ci nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig lags sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig lags sam/ theg pa
274b2(mdo sde): chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig lags/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de la ni rnam par rtog pa'am/ spros pa 'ga' yang med la/ 
274b3(mdo sde): tha dad pa nyid kyang ma yin/ gcig pa nyid kyang ma yin sna tshogs nyid kyang ma yin pa'i phyir ro// bu moso smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du rnam par rtog pa ma mchis
274b4(mdo sde): pa dang / spros pa ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad dang / da tha dad du dbyer ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la ni gang gnas par 'gyur ba'am/ yongs su mya ngan las
274b5(mdo sde): 'das par 'gyur ba'i chos de dmigasu ma mchis la/ gas so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo khyod/ kyi spobs pa ni ngo mtshar na/ gzhan yang khyod kyis de bzhin
274b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur byas/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad ces khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji skad cig la bsnyen bkur byas
274b7(mdo sde): shes gsung ba ni/ de bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings ji snyed pa la'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo de bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings kyang ji snyed cig yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun
274b8(mdo sde): pa shA ra dwa to'i bu ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa ji snyed pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa yang ji snyed cig yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa
275a1(mdo sde): shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo sems can gyi khams kyang ji snyed cig yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA
275a2(mdo sde): ra dwa ti'i bu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul ji snyed pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis ci zhig lan btab pa
275a3(mdo sde): yin bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gnas brtan gyis gang yongs su dris pa de nyid kyi lan bdag gis btabs legs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo kho bos ci zhig
275a4(mdo sde): yongs su dris/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yi ge gang dag yongs su dris pa de dag nyid nges par ba stan lag so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo yi ge rnam
275a5(mdo sde): ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa ste/ gdags su med pa yin pas de dag ni nges par bstan par mi nuso// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du skye ba ma
275a6(mdo sde): mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la yang gang gis yongs su dris pa dang / gang gis lan btab pa de gnyi ga yang dmigs su ma
275a7(mdo sde): mchis lag so shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo 'di ltar khyod ni bzod pa thob cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dag pa yod pa kho na yin pas/ khyod ni ring por mi thogs par bla
275a8(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub ces bgyi ba de yang spros pa lag so// 
275b1(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba de yang spros pa lags so// nye ba zhes bgyi ba 'am/ ring ba zhes bgyi ba de yang spros pa lags so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i
275b2(mdo sde): bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni skye ba ma mchis pa/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa/ chad pa ma mchis pa/ rtag pa ma mchis pa/ don cig pa ma lags pa/ don tha
275b3(mdo sde): dad pa ma lags pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ 'gro ba ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags pas/ de la ni gang mngon par
275b4(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba 'ga' yang dmig/ das su ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub ni gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ma lags pa ste/ 
275b5(mdo sde): byang chub ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / gnyis dang bral ba lags pa'i slad du'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras// 
275b6(mdo sde): bu mo khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar song shig dang / kho bo cag kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir der 'dong ngo // de nas gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bu mo zla mchog gis 'di
275b7(mdo sde): skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyan 'tshal ba rnams la chos ston par mi mdzad lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo 'o na de bzhin
275b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa su dag la chos ston par mdzad/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag nyan par bgyid kyang / dga' bar mi bgyid/ mngon par dga' bar mi bgyid pa
276a1(mdo sde): rnams la'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo sems can mang po dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dong zhing / de bzhin gshegs
276a2(mdo sde): pa yang de dag la chos ston par mi mdzad dam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs par 'du shes shing chos la ngor 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i sems
276a3(mdo sde): can rnams ni 'di snyam du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ bdag cag la ches ston par mdzad pa'o// 'di ni chos te bstan par bgyi ba'o// snyam du sems lags kyi/ chos
276a4(mdo sde): kyi dbyings rtogs pa rnams ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ chos sam bstan pa zhes pa/ gyi bar sems pa ma mchis lags so// de nas gnas
276a5(mdo sde): brtan 'od srung chen pos gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti 'i bu 'di lta bu'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i bu mo 'di de bzhin
276a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'gro bas na/ der ni chos bstan pa chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ bdag cig zan bcad de phyir log na ni 'o bu cag la legs kyi/ bdag cag
276a7(mdo sde): chos mnyan pa de lta bu las phyi rol tu gyur na ni ma yin no// de nas nyan thos chen po de dag phyir phyogs te/ de nyid nas phyir log par gyur to// de nas bu mo zla mchog tshal chen
276a8(mdo sde): po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
276b1(mdo sde): la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spros pa dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs
276b2(mdo sde): dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// mngon par rab tu gtor to// skye bo phal po che de dag gis kyang ji ltar thogs pa'i me
276b3(mdo sde): tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtorau to// gtor ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la me tog de dag
276b4(mdo sde): me tog gi gdugs rgyar dpag tshad bcu tsam pa zhi ngag tu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsu dag gi drang thad kyi steng na 'dug par gyur to// de nas 'jam/ 
276b5(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smraso// bu mo khyod gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir 'ongs/ 'di nas sho 'phos nas ni gang du 'gro
276b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du dgongs gang bdag gi sug pa g.yas pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+ma la bzhugs pa 'di gang nas shi 'phos te/ 
276b7(mdo sde): 'dir byon la/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni/ gang du skye bar 'gyur snyam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'di ni sprul pa ste/ sprul pa ni 'chi 'pho yang mngal skye ba yang med do// bu mos
276b8(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gis kyang de bzhin du sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyis chos thams cad la gang 'chi 'pho ba'am/ skye ba ma mthong lags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
277a1(mdo sde): mthong ba don yod kyis bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo bud med kyi lus kyis ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus na/ 
277a2(mdo sde): khyod ci'i phyir bud med kyi lus sgyur bar mi byed/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid lags pas/ stong pa nyid la ni ldog pa dang 'gyur/ 
277a3(mdo sde): ba ma mchis lags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'as 'dzin gyis/ bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngam/ bu mos
277a4(mdo sde): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dis gzigs pa ltar bdag gis kyang ji bzhin gshegs pa mthong lags so// byang chub sems
277a5(mdo sde): dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod mgau tA ma la spobs par gyi shig/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings la ni brjod par bgyi ba
277a6(mdo sde): dang / rab tu brjod par bgyi ba ma mchis la/ chos kyi dbyings yi gar 'grang ba yang ma lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa thogs pa med pas smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis
277a7(mdo sde): sngon de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar chos ji lta bu thos/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i slad du steng du gzigs shig dang / bar snang tsa 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs
277a8(mdo sde): pa yang de 'dra la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ci 'dra bar chos bstan pa nyid kyang de 'dra/ nyan pa nyid kyang de 'dra ste/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni na mkha'i mtshan nyid de lta bu lags/ 
277b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag la ji ltar sbyin pa byin zhing / ji ltar yongs su bsngos/ bu mos smras
277b2(mdo sde): pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin pa zhig phul bar gyur na/ de la
277b3(mdo sde): rgyu ba ji lta bu zhig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ smras pa bu mo sprul pa la ni rgyu ba 'ga' yang 'byung ba med do// bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis kyang sngon gyi de bzhin
277b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa dag la de ltar sbyin pa byin zhing yongs su de bsngo ba lags so// byang chub sems dpa' tho/ gas med sems kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod sems can
277b5(mdo sde): rnams la ji ltar byams pas khyab par byed/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can de dag ji lta bu kho na bzhin du'o// smras pa/ bu mo sems can de dag kyang
277b6(mdo sde): ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'das pa yang ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma lags/ da ltar byung ba yang ma lags la/ sems de yang 'das pa yang ma lags/ ma
277b7(mdo sde): 'ongs pa yang ma lags/ da ltar byung ba yang ma lags pas/ byams pa sgom pa de ni 'di 'dra'o zhes gdags par rngo mi thogs lags so// byang chub sems dpa' mchog
277b8(mdo sde): tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis chos kyi mig thob bam/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis sha'i mig kyang ma thob lags na/ chos kyi mig lta
278a1(mdo sde): thob par ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas smras pa/ bu mo khyod yun ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
278a2(mdo sde): la yang dag par zhugs/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yun ji srid cig nas/ smig rgyu la chu yang dag par zhugs pa'i yun de srid nas/ bdag kyang byang chub la yang dag par
278a3(mdo sde): zhugs lag so de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod yun ji srid cig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
278a4(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// bu mos smras pa/ yun ji srid cig byang chub semadas dpa' byams pa so so'i skye bo'i sa las 'da' bar
278a5(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi sa las kyang 'da' bar 'a/ gyur ba de srid kyis lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad
278a6(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sring mo 'di gtso bo chen po// go cha chen po bgos pa/ 'di lta bu dag dang lhan cig yang dag par sgra yang 'jigs par mi bgyid// 
278a7(mdo sde): dman par mi bgyid pa ni bu mo 'di'i spobs pa ngo mtshar lag so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bu mo zla mchog gis 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 
278a8(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper bgyi na// zhugs ni ji tsam du chung yang sreg pa'i ngo bo nyid lags pas/ ji tsam du nye bar len pa rnyed pa de tsam du sreg par bgyid lags so// btsun pa shA ra
278b1(mdo sde): dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bgrod pa tha dad du dbye ba cung zad kyang ma mchis pas/ de dag thams cad bdag
278b2(mdo sde): dang gzhan dag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo byang chub thob na khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci
278b3(mdo sde): 'dra bar 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu tsa 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i sems
278b4(mdo sde): can dman pa la mos pa/ shes rab chung ba gzhin gyi don la mi lta ba/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag/ par zhugs pa dag gis ming yang grag par mi 'gyur ba/ 
278b5(mdo sde): de lta bur 'gyur lag so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo gang khyod 'di skad ces chos kyi dbyings ni gci ga go// de bzhin nyid na cig go zhes zer na/ 'o na ci khyod kyis
278b6(mdo sde): nyan thos rnams ni dman pa nyid yin la/ ci sangs rgyas rnams ni lhag pa yin par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper
278b7(mdo sde): bgyi na/ ba lang gi rjes kyi cha ba gang lags pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po gang lags pa'i cha ba de dag la ni bye brag chung zad kyang ma mchis lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang ba lang gi rjes
278b8(mdo sde): la ni rgya mtsho chen po ltar sems can tshad ma mchis pa dag gi go skabs ma mchis lags so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / 
279a1(mdo sde): nyan thos rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings gcig las nges par 'byung ba lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyan thos rnams kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dag ltar
279a2(mdo sde): sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyid par rngo mi thog lags so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ yungs 'bru'i khongs su chud pa'i
279a3(mdo sde): nam mkha'i khams gang lags pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thad kyi khongs su chud pa'i nam mkha'i khams gang lags pa'i na mkha'i khams de dag la ni bye brag cung
279a4(mdo sde): zad kyang ma mchis lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang yungs 'bru'i khongs su chud pa'i na mkha' la ni phyogs bcu'i khongs su chud pa'i nam mkha' ltar grong dang grong khyer
279a5(mdo sde): dang / yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang dag rab tu rmi gnas shing kun tu mi gnas la/ ri'i rgyal po ro rab dag kyang ma mchis/ rgya mtsho chen po dag kyang ma mchis
279a6(mdo sde): lags so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyang stong pa nyid dang / mtsham ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa gcig las nges
279a7(mdo sde): par byung ba lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyan thos rnams kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag ltar sems can tshad ma mchis
279a8(mdo sde): grangs ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyid par rngo mi thog lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba gcig pa ma
279b1(mdo sde): yin nam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad ces sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba gcig go zhes gas
279b2(mdo sde): ba ni skur pa 'debs pa lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo ci'i phyir/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du de khyod nyid la yongs su zhus/ khyod kyis ji ltar/ 
279b3(mdo sde): bzod pa de bzhin du lan gdab tu gsol/ gang gi tshe btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems rnam par grol ba de'i tshe/ dzi ga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag
279b4(mdo sde): mthil ltar mnyam par kun tu gnas par gyur lag/ sa sam/ ji ga shing ljon pa dang ri thams cad kyi// sa khyod logs su mngon par phyogs te btud/ mngon par btud/ 
279b5(mdo sde): mngon par rab tu btud lags sam jig ngan song tham sa cad rab tu zhi bar gyur lags sam/ jig sam sa can thams cad nyon mongs po dang bral bar 'gyur lags
279b6(mdo sde): sam/ ji ga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'og tu mnar ma mchis pa la thug pa yan chad dang / steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar dag 'od
279b7(mdo sde): zer gyi kha dog lta bus snang bar gyur lags sam/ dzi ga lha thams cad kyis phyag bgyis lags sam/ ji ga bdud kyis sa dang na mkha' dpag tshad sum cu tshun chad dpung gis khyab
279b8(mdo sde): par bgyis te mchis par gyur lags sam/ ji ga sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam par grol lags sam/ ji ga khyod byang chub pa dang dus gcig kho/ 
280a1(mdo sde): na bdud thams cad nges par bcom lags sam/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis kho bo la ji skad smras pa de dag las de'i rgyu gcig tsam yang
280a2(mdo sde): ma byung ngo // bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po dam pa la gnas pa la ni yon tan gyi khyad par de dag dang gzhan yang dpag
280a3(mdo sde): tu ma mchis pa dag byung bar gyur pas ne/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin go shigs pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba'i khyad par ni de lags so// 
280a4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo zla mchog la leg/ sa so shes bya ba byin te/ bu mo leg so legs so// bu mo khyod de skad ston pa ni yang khyod lags so// 
280a5(mdo sde): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus bu mo zla mchog gi lag pa g.yas par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+ma la ba zhugs pa byung bar gyur pa gang yin pa de/ pad+ma'i gdan
280a6(mdo sde): de las mngon par 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'ad la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku lte ba'i khung du zhugs so// de nas de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi
280a7(mdo sde): mthus sa chen po rab tu g.yos par gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i khung bu thams cad nas pad+ma gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/ sdong bu rnams ni gser/ 'dab ma rnams ni
280a8(mdo sde): dngul/ snying po rnams ni rin po che dpal gyi snying po las grub pa dag byung bar gyur to// pad+ma de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa/ pad+ma la
280b1(mdo sde): bzhugs pa dag kun tu snang bar gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu gshegs te/ sangs rgyas
280b2(mdo sde): med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na chos ston par kun tu snang zhing / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos bstan pa de dag kyang 'dir kun tu grag go// de nas bu mo zla mchog
280b3(mdo sde): gis de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po mthong nas dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ des lag pa g.yas pa na thogs par gyur
280b4(mdo sde): pa'i pad+ma gang yin pa de/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba da lo/ gas su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba
280b5(mdo sde): bzhi zug pa/ cha mnyam pa shin tu rnam par phye ba zhig tu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi dra nga thad kyi steng gi na mkha' la 'dug par gyur to// khang pa
280b6(mdo sde): brtsegs pa der yang khri gdan rkang pa rin po ches spras pa lha'i ras bcos bu 'bum phrag du ma bting ba zhig byung bar gyur to// khri gdan de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
280b7(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pa ci 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhig bzhugs par yang kun tu snang ngo // des pad+ma de 'phangs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
280b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ngar 'dzin pa/ nga yar 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga'ir 'dzin pa spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig
281a1(mdo sde): yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ de'i lag par pad+ma gnyis pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su 'phang so// 'phangs ma
281a2(mdo sde): thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / des tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i
281a3(mdo sde): rtsa ba 'dis 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang 'brel ba'i sems can rnams la/ 'jig chags la lta ba sbyangs pa'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ de
281a4(mdo sde): lag par pad+ma gsum pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / de sa de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su da'aphangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan
281a5(mdo sde): 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pazhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rtog pa
281a6(mdo sde): dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi
281a7(mdo sde): mthus de'i lag par pad+ma bzhi pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi
281a8(mdo sde): steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bzhi pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis phyin ci log bzhi spang ba'i slad du/ 
281b1(mdo sde): sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma lnga pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
281b2(mdo sde): 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa lnga pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
281b3(mdo sde): bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sgrib pa ldi dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sgrib pa lnga spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma drug pa
281b4(mdo sde): zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan la/ das ga la ba der logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs dam thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i
281b5(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa drug pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis skye mched drug la rten pa'i sems
281b6(mdo sde): can rnams la skye mched drug yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma bdun pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang // 
281b7(mdo sde): des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangaso// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bdun pa zhig tu gyur pa
281b8(mdo sde): dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun dang ldan pa'i sems can rnam par shes pa gnas
282a1(mdo sde): / pa bdun yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi bar slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyu mthus/ de'i lag par pad+ma brgyad pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / 
282a2(mdo sde): de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di
282a3(mdo sde): skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis log pa nyid brgyad la nges pa'i sems can rnams la log pa nyid brgyad nges par spang ba'i slad du chos ston par
282a4(mdo sde): gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma/ dgu pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom daldan 'das ga la ba der logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma
282a5(mdo sde): thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i kha pa brtsegs pa dgu pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'a/ de skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
282a6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la/ kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur
282a7(mdo sde): cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma bcu pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+mad+ma
282a8(mdo sde): yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i btsug gi drang thad kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bcu pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag da/ 
282b1(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar da ltar bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcur snang bas khyab par mdzad pa ltar stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig/ de nas pad+ma'i khang pa brtseg
282b2(mdo sde): pa de dag gong nas gong du brtsegs pa'i phang gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug par gyur to// de'i tshe nas bla ba'i lha yan chad nas tshangs ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams la pad+ma'i
282b3(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gis yang dag par bskul nas/ lha bye ba phrag dpag tu med pa dag 'dus par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas
282b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de gang gi tshe 'dzum da ma nga pa 'iche/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od dazer kha dog du ma/ kha dog sna tshogs kha dog 'bum phrag
282b5(mdo sde): du ma 'di lta ste sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / brtsod ka dang / shel dang / dngulagyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi
282b6(mdo sde): khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ 'od kyis nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zil kyis gnan nas phyir
282b7(mdo sde): log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas
282b8(mdo sde): la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dzum pa'i don yongs su zhugs pa/ 
283a1(mdo sde): mkhyen pa kun la mngon sum spyan mnga' zhing // chos rnams kun la nem nur rnam dag la/ 'jig rten kun dang mi mnyam thugs mnga' ba// rgyal dbang ci slad
283a2(mdo sde): 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// khyod kyis mtha' yas dus nas sbyin pa byin// khyod khrims rnams dag nor bu rin chen 'dra// khyod kyis bzod pa'ang mi g.yos lhun po bzhin// drang srong chen
283a3(mdo sde): bo ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad// bsam gtan brnyes shing brtson 'grus stobs ldan pa// gnod bral na dang rga las rnam par grol// rgya mtsho 'dra bar shin tu zab pa'i blo// thub chen ci
283a4(mdo sde): slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// byams la gnas shing thu/ gas rjer gnas pa'o// thub pa btang snyoms dang ni dga' la gnas// 'dod chags la sogs 'jigs bsal
283a5(mdo sde): rab tu zhig/ thub dbang ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// khyod spu gcig nas byung ba'i 'od zer des// phyogs pa cu'i 'jig rten mtha' yas khams rnams su// gnyi zla
283a6(mdo sde): myur du mog mog rab mdzad de// gzi brjid zil gyis gnon cing mig kyang rtsol// 'gro ba'i mgon gcig khyod gsung rnam par dag/ snyan cing yid 'ong yan lag drug tu ldan// gang
283a7(mdo sde): dag nyan pa de dag mi ngoms shing // nyon mongs thams cad ma lus zhi bar bgyi// phyogs bcu mtha' yas sems can gang mchis pa'i// sems kyi spyod pa du ma gang lags pa// 
283a8(mdo sde): de mkhyen de dag som nyi gcod pa po// rang byung ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// deng su'i sems ni byang chub slad du nges// su zhig sangs rgyas theg pa yangs par zhugs// khyab bdag
283b1(mdo sde): gang gi yid bsams rab tu grub// thub dbang ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// gang gis de ring bdud bzhi pham bgyis shing // nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi bdag bdud chen dang // gang gis
283b2(mdo sde): phung po lta bu mang po'i bdud// pham par bgyis sam ci slad khyod 'dzum mdzad// de ring su zhig don chen yangs 'gyur zhing // su zhig chos lo legs bgyid mi seng ge/ de ring
283b3(mdo sde): su zhig sgra ni phyogs rnams mchi// thub dbang ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// kun mkhyen mi dge thams cad rab spangs pa// sems can kun la mtshungs par byams pa po// 
283b4(mdo sde): g.yo ba kun dang rtog pa rnam spangs pa// drang srong chen po ci slang 'dzum pa mdzad// de ring su zhig yangs pa che/ dan po 'thob// deng su'i sems kyi smon pa legs 'grub
283b5(mdo sde): cing // deng su stobs bcu rnams dang ldan par 'gyur// dgra thul ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// mkha' la gnas pa lha klu bye ba dang // gnod sbyin mkha' lding
283b6(mdo sde): lto 'phye cher bcas dang // sa la thal sbyar skyes pa bud med rnams// dga' zhing lha mi dbang po zla ba lta// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mang po ni// dam chos 'tshal ba
283b7(mdo sde): rgya mtsho lta bu dag/ phyogs bcu dag nas lhags pa dgra thul ba// yongs dag thugs mnga' 'dzum don bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tsha dang ldan pa kun dga'
283b8(mdo sde): bo la phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// gang gis rgyal ba'i cho 'phrul mchog mthong nas// byang chub phyir ni rgya chen sems bskyed cing / nga yi mdun na thal sbyar gang 'dug
284a1(mdo sde): pa// mdun gyi bu mo mthong ngam kun dga' bo// 'dis ni sngon gyi srid par rtag tu yang // rgyal ba gsum brgya legs par mchod byas shing // ji ltar bdag ni
284a2(mdo sde): byang chub mchog reg ces// rgyal ba de dag kun la mngon sum zhus// nam yang lan 'ga' ngan 'gror ma song zhing // 'di ni rtag tu lha mi'i 'jig rten skyes// nam yang byang chub
284a3(mdo sde): sems ni ma brjed cing // 'chi dus byas kyang rtag tu tshe rabs dran// rgyal ba 'od srung zhes bya mthong nas ni// khang bzangs steng nas mdzes pa'i lus mtshangs te// rgya chen sems
284a4(mdo sde): kyis 'od srung de mchod nas// de nas rjes 'thun bzod pa/ thob par gyur/ sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig ces dmatshan gsol pa// de la na bza' dam pa phrugs phul bas/ 
284a5(mdo sde): de phyir 'di yi lus mdog gser 'dra la// mdzes shing dang / la zla ba 'dra ba yin// ston pa gser thub ces bya ba nga yin pa// de la bdug pa spos mchog phul bas na// de'i
284a6(mdo sde): phyir 'di yi kha dang spu khung nas/ ud pal tsan dan dri ngad rab tu byung // gtsug tor zhes bya rkang gnyis mchog de la// 'dis ni mtshan bdun nges par brtags gyur pas// de phyir 'di
284a7(mdo sde): yi mig mdog mthon ting la// 'gro ba rtog par byed pa ngoms mi 'gyur// tshe rabs lnga brgya dag tu 'dod spangs shing // tshangs spyod rnam par spyod pa dag byas pas// de phyir chags pas
284a8(mdo sde): gdungs pas 'di mthong na// de tshe 'dod chags can dag chags bral 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas nas 'di 'phos te// 'dir lid ci byi khyim ni yangs par skyes// skye dgu kun
284b1(mdo sde): tu tshe rabs dran gyur cing // tshigs bcad dbyangs kyis smra ba'i bya ba shes// pha ma yongs su smin par bya ba dang // de bzhin sems can gzhan don byed 'dod cing // la la byang chub
284b2(mdo sde): phyir ni sems bskyed phyir// de phyir yangs pa'i khyim 'dir rab tu skyes// bud med skyes pa nye du mdza' ba shes dang // gzhon nu ma dag gdul ba'i phyir// de dag stong phrag drug cu
284b3(mdo sde): 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas theg pa mchog la yongs smin byas// 'di ni ring po mi thogs bud med kyi// lus bsgyur nga yi bstan la rab byung zhing // tshangs spyod dam pa rgya chen spyad byas
284b4(mdo sde): nas/ shi 'phos lha'i 'jig rten 'gro bar 'gyur// lha gnas de nas shi 'phos phyir yang ni// dus mtha'i// tshe na chos 'di srung 'gyur zhing // 'dir yang skye dgu'i
284b5(mdo sde): don chen byas nas ni// 'di nas phyir yang dga' ldan 'gro bar 'gyur// gang tshe mi 'pham dgra las rgyal ba po// dung gi sras su gyur te 'byung ba'i tshe// da ni bzo don rgyu rtsal
